Combat is extremely simplified, taking place against one opponent at a time and only allowing a choice between attacking, casting spells or fleeing. There is no micromanagement of party members or their inventory.

The game includes a form of economy, with credits that can be looted from defeated monsters, bet in casinos and used to buy weaponry, shields, torches and rations. Light sources, along with light spells, are essential to the exploration of dungeons.

name: Kaizo Nikki
summary:
Kaizo Nikki is a fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A poor fool by the name of "Hitmetsuki" is stuck in a strange place where he is tasked to go through several worlds and obtain "Pillars". It would appear that surviving those worlds might be harder than expected, however.

Kaizo Nikki is a more difficulty-based take on the Yume Nikki formula, featuring more enemies, more puzzles and more tricky terrain to navigate than usual.

name: Kamen Ridertchi
summary: The Kamen Ridertchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the Toei television series Kamen Rider, created to celebrate the show's 50th anniversary.

name: Karakuri Kengeki
summary: Karakuri Kengeki is a VR sword-fighting game in which the player fights as a samurai robot using a Japanese katana, moving through various stages redolent of old Japan.

name: Kanji Drive
summary: Supplement your Japanese practice with this arcade driving game. Learn common kanji, hiragana, words, and verbs while having fun. Go through flashcards effortlessly.

name: Kame Paradise
summary: Kame Paradise, made by Yamamoto Doujin, is a Dragon Ball Hentai Game released on March 07,2018. It is part of a series of games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters from Dragon Ball: Original, Z, GT, and Super.

name: Kame Paradise 2
summary: Kame Paradise 2, made by Yamamoto Doujin, is a sequel to Kame Paradise, being a Dragon Ball Hentai Game released on November 23rd, 2021. It is part of a series of games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters from Dragon Ball: Original, Z, GT, and Super. This entry has character from Original, Z, GT, and Super, as opposed to the first game which mostly just focuses on characters from Original Dragon Ball.

name: Kame Paradise 3 Multiversex
summary: Kame Paradise 3 Multiversex, made by Yamamoto Doujin, is the 3rd entry to Kame Paradise series, being a Dragon Ball Hentai Game released on January 13th, 2023. It is part of a series of games made by Yamamoto. It is a R+18 Adult Hentai game featuring Dragon Ball Characters from Dragon Ball: Original, Z, GT, and Super. This entry has character from Z, GT, and Super, as well as including Vomi/Android 21 from Dragon Ball FighterZ/Dragon Ball Super.

name: Kardomance
summary:
A competitive card game set in the fantasy world of Ama Luria.
Developed and published by Armored Frog Games.

name: Karza Football Man 2017
summary:
Karza Football Man. 2017 is a funny old-style football management game!
You'll have to take the helm of a glorious team which is on the brink of failure.
Will you be able to bring it back to its place in the football hall of fame?
Possibly the most important characteristic of Karza Football Man. 2017 is that the game can be played almost forever, and every time the game will be completely different!

name: Kaepernick Football
summary: Play as the clutch QB on the game-winning drive. Pass or run, every play counts with 60 seconds left. Can you make the big-time quarterback throws for the 4th QTR comeback?

name: Karate Hero
summary:
Karate Hero – Become a real karate master!
You can now become a true, black-belt karate master! Be a shocking maiden or a fiery dude! Fight, train and go through the single-player adventure. With 7 exciting martial-arts challenges, you will never be bored and quickly on your way to become a true hero of karate!

name: Kart Stars
summary: Welcome to the World Karting Championships! Race through a single player campaign or go head to head with players from around the world. Feel the rush as you play through vintage, sprint and super karts in a massive 300 round world championship season. Outrun the competition and finish on the podium to earn coins, upgrade your kart, and become the World Karting Champion!

name: Kakikuku Jump!
summary:
Enjoy jumping games for free.
Overcome your obstacles by jumping in time.
You can collect a variety of jumpers with unique coins earned during play.
It`s difficult, but you can do it. Never give up!

name: KayserRotz
summary: 《KyserRotz》 is a new,single,rogue-like,adventure game.Players have to stand their ground under the siege from enemy,challenge to the last.

name: Kanashibari
summary: Kanashibari is a unique game with rouge-lite elements and real-time grid-based combat.

name: Kapital Punishment 22XX
summary: Battle relentless cyborg police in a grim 23rd century dystopia. Experience fast-paced, bloody combat in this retro-inspired beat-'em up, action platformer. Recruit comrades and collect upgrades as you traverse hazardous environs to reach KAPITAL and take down the oligarchs in charge!

name: Kayak League
summary: Kayak League is a fast-paced, physics-driven party royale game where you compete through various types of stylized courses, competing to be the last one standing!

name: KaiJu Girls
summary: Kaiju Girls is a Visual Novel full of Monster Girls. The protagonist lost his memory in an accident and became a KaijuTamer, with the Kaiju girls in the Kaiju world full of danger adventure! In the wonderful and exciting adventure journey in the protagonist will slowly recall his memories.

name: Kanzo
summary: Kanzo offers a unique third-person action: fast-paced, savage combat, and an unique setting that mixes science fiction with cyberpunk theme. It tells the story of a world that has as of now finished and its tenants who battle to outlive.

name: Kaila
summary: Kaila is a visceral adventure set in an unrelentless, vicious world. Take part of an unforgiving story, leading a gang of four unique outcasts on their quest for survival, or die trying.

name: Kaitou Tantei Blonde Lady
summary: The Phantom Thief Detective Blonde Lady" is a girlslove novel and platformer 2Daction game in which a beautiful thief and a detective fight and get along with each other! Control the thief to wade through traps, steal treasure chests, and escape from the detective who is closing in on you!

name: Kai Yuan
summary: This is a city building game with the historical background of the Tang Dynasty of China in the 7-8th century. In the game, you will build a prosperous city in the Tang Dynasty of China.

name: Kazoku Keikaku Soshite Mata Kazoku Keikaku o
summary: Fan disc to Family Project.

name: Kawaii Dake ja Dame?
summary: Romance/puzzle game centering on "landmine" girls.

name: Kanji Islands
summary: Come to Kanji Islands and learn all the Kanjis and vocabulary necessary to become a proficient Japanese reader!

name: Kaseifu Koi wa Keiyaku Kara
summary: Visual novel by Voltage inc.

name: Kaleidoscope Chateau
summary: Unpack the past and deny the future in this first-person psychological horror about the perception of memory, time and the lengths we go to control these forces. Find your remaining possessions and say goodbye to your shining castle, your diamond home, your Kaleidoscope Chateau.

name: Kalpa: The Sign of Omen
summary:
In July 1999, a strategy role-playing game developed by Dynasty International Information and published by Soft-World Technology was released along with the well-known computer magazine "Software and CD" in mainland China. This game is called "Kalpa: The Sign of Omen". Due to its low price of 25 yuan for the full version, it attracted a large number of players.

Most people were initially scared off by its difficulty, making the most common screen seen at the beginning "defeat." Then, there were a lot of game-breaking bugs, causing many players to have to start over. There was even a rumor online that the game company was treating players as free testers. As a result, the magazine "Software and CD" had to include a patch in its August issue to appease the players' anger.

In September 1999, the "enhanced version" of "Kalpa: The Sign of Omen" was released at a price of 69 yuan. In addition to a big box packaging, the game also came with a full-color manual and a fan comic. The game version was also upgraded to 1.1. This version looked like a deluxe edition, and many players who owned the standard edition were not interested in it. However, this version contained a big secret, which was the perfect ending of the game. The relevant levels were not included in the standard version.

name: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
summary: Confessing love to someone is one of the most intimidating challenges we face in our lives. Kaguya-sama: Love is War takes this relatable fear to the extreme. This visual novel isn't your average rom-com; it's a fight between two stubborn geniuses in a battle of who will confess first.

name: Karate Do
summary: The epic Karate Do world awaits you. Step into the place where only the chosen ones fight. Gather the wisdom of Sensei through great challenges along, master your skills and become a legend of martial arts. Are you sure you have trained enough?

name: Kazak
summary: In this retro inspired turn-based RPG, customize your battle skills, test your reflexes and blast your way through hostile environments. With multiple level routes, story paths, endings and more, no two playthroughs will be alike.

name: Kabuto
summary: In this game every move matters, kabuto and a pixel art puzzle game where you control a samurai who seeks revenge in a world where only the strong survive.

name: Katakoi Contrast: Way of Parting Vol.2
summary: Part of "triAngle PROJECT," a collaboration project between Otomate and Frontier Works.

name: Katakoi Contrast: Way of Parting Vol.3
summary: Part of "triAngle PROJECT," a collaboration project between Otomate and Frontier Works.

name: Kanji Industry
summary: Kanji Industry is an roguelike automatic kanji production game. Players build a production line by arranging machines. The entire game progresses in a deck-building roguelike format. You can get the machine by clearing the stage. Let's enjoy high strategy!

name: Kakuriyo Village: Moratorium of Adolescence
summary: Ao & Hinori were both childhood sweethearts and accidentally went to a strange world called Kakuriyo Village. Because of her boyish appearance, the villagers mistakenly thought Hinori was a boy... Can they successfully hide Hinori's genders and escape from the village!?

name: Kaizo Mario Bros. 3
summary: Kaizo Mario Bros. 3 is a kaizo ROM hack of Super Mario Bros. 3 created by Hunter W.

name: Kabuto Kuwagata
summary:
Beetle battle game from Corocoro Comic!

One day, the main character, who loves beetles and stag beetles, warps into another world where giant insects live. There, the insects have gone berserk and are attacking people!
The main character grows a beetle stag beetle and fights against the rampaging insects to unravel the mystery!
Will the hero be able to safely return to the Earth?

name: Kay's Destiny
summary:
A retro style indie JRPG with pixel art graphics and a live piano soundtrack.
Created by youtuber "KayThePianist".

name: Karpov
summary: "Karpov" is a visual horror novel shrouded in mysticism.Do you see THEM? Sneaking around in the shadows. Hiding their motives. You are far from the first to confront them. Are you sure you're strong enough? How presumptuous. Take your time. One false step and you won't be able to go back.

name: Kabama
summary:
Kabama is a turn-based board game for one or two players.
In Kabama, Players take turns to move, either by placing a counter of their own colour next to one of their existing counters, or by sliding any column or row of the board by exactly one square (touch and slide to do this).
If a player forms a 2x2 square of his / her own colour, those pieces are removed. The winner is the first player to remove all of their pieces from the board.

name: Katamari Damacy Mobile
summary:
Katamari Damacy Mobile (塊魂モバイル, Katamari Damashii Mobairu, lit. "Clump Spirit Mobile") is a video game developed by Namco Bandaifor the Mitsubishi P904i series of mobile phones for NTT DoCoMo. It was released in June 2007 in Japan. It is a spin-off of the "Katamari Series", the second game on a portable system and the third game produced without the involvement of series creator Keita Takahashi.

This version of the game uses a unique method of control, by making use of a software technology called GestureTek EyeMobile to make phones capable of detecting vibration via the built in camera on the P904i. The player is able to move the katamari ball forward, backwards, left and right by merely tilting the phone.

There are also traditional controls as an option to the default motion controls.

Katamari Damacy Mobile will come pre-installed on P904i model phones. Other phone models need to download the game through the Namco Games channel.

name: Katamari Damacy-Kun
summary: Katamari Damacy-Kun (塊魂くん lit, Katamari Damashii-Kun) is a Japanese-only mobile phone game that was distributed on i-mode, Yahoo! Kentai, and EZweb. It's a 2D Katamari game based on the ending 8-bit minigame from Me & My Katamari. Along with including the original levels from M&MK, it has many unique stages as well. Also included is a story (much like the one the original Katamari Damacy had) and a Collection, where you can look at rolled up items. This has a few new modes, including a tutorial and the Story Mode. Apparently, something of interest happens after completing the collection.

name: Katamari Damacy Mobile+
summary:
On November 17, 2011, an Android port of the original Katamari Damacy was released in Japan. There are scarce details outside of those present on Matrixsoft.

It's uncertain what changes if any were made when Katamari Damacy Mobile+ was released. It is clear though that game was adapted to work on smartphones.

name: Katamari Damacy Mobile 2
summary: Katamari Damacy Mobile 2 was released on the Apple Store on March 8, 2012. Katamari Damacy Mobile 2 was a Japanese iOS exclusive that can't be downloaded anymore.

name: Kagura Survivors: Endless Night
summary: Something is wrong in the Kaguraverse. An anomaly is creating tears in space-time and causing parallel worlds to converge! It falls upon Kagura-chan, the vessel of the Goddess's will, to get to the bottom of this crisis and return order to the various universes.

name: Kainga: Collector's Edition
summary: Comes with soundtrack, digital artbook, and wallpaper.

name: Kaiten Sushi VR
summary: Kaiten Sushi VR is a game that you can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant.

name: Kaitou Elf Liely
summary: Drama CD fantasy story, featuring interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: Kamikaze Pigs
summary: A Flash-based, chain reaction game in where players must fry as many pigs as possible. The pigs are on edge and will fire at the first sign of trouble, causing further chaos and combos. Once the player gets enough money and stars, they can purchase upgrades in the shop to grant the pigs more guns and explosives to keep combos going.

name: Katana Infinity
summary: Discover Zero's first mission after the war and a new mysterious character : Infinity.

name: KarmaZoo
summary: Share the love and die trying! KarmaZoo is a joyful, altruistic, cooperative platformer where up to 10 random players help each other with the unique abilities of 50 different characters - all for the sake of good Karma.

name: Kartoon Crazy Racing
summary:
The most entertaining racing game you will ever play! It will do the delights of the lovers of the speed and 3d cars with these incredible super karts of competition. A battle in the candy looking tracks with an agreeable aesthetic for kids and players of all ages.
Enjoy the most impressive cars in this 3d car racing game! You have to take the turbo to advance positions, you can also throw paint, slingshot with bee, take double turbo that will get you to advance many positions in the crazy 3d race these funny little friends have mounted.
If you love cars and motorcycles racing games you can not pass up the opportunity to drive a super kart, with your favorite cartoon! You can choose over 16 amazing and unique different skins on 8 of the candy tracks you will see.
Crash kart and move your opponents, throw Bee, send a hurricane! Try to not catch the balloons when you are at the top positions or you will be affected by AutoBoom! Leaves trails of oil to your opponents and they will can’t follow you! Enjoy this 3d game and shows who the best in the world.

name: KartMania
summary: "KartMania" is a real-oriented racing kart game. Changing settings such as seat position and sprocket diameter, Let's capture the circuit course with driving technique!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Bend the Roo'les
summary: “Bend the Roo'les” features 5 new levels, each with their own unique twist on the formula of Kao the Kangaroo: new perspectives, a retro-inspired design, and the continuation of Kao versus the Eternal World!

name: Kalevania
summary: Kalevania is a retro action platformer loosely based on Finnish mythology. Fight with bare hands, sword, axe, bow, and 11 runic weapons. With 50+ enemy types and collectibles, enjoy a full retro gaming experience! Play as Väinämöinen and relive classic console gaming!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Anniversary Edition
summary: A year after the world premiere of the newest adventures of Kao the Kangaroo, the Anniversary Edition is finally here!

name: Katoa
summary: Create living habitats & help save the real world too! Build & nurture exotic, living habitats in Katoa, and help the real-world too! Habitats you grow, nurture, and protect in-game contribute $ to Earth Day, Great Barrier Reef Foundation, Save The Penguins & SOA. $50,000 campaign for Earth Day in May!

name: Kaizo Mario Galaxy
summary: A mod for Super Mario Galaxy that reworks all stars in the game to make them more difficult. Some changes include reduced coins and life mushrooms, frame perfect jumps and more star chips and silver stars.

name: Kam Thunder
summary: Kam Thunder is a 2D platformer action-adventure game. It is a fast-paced project with a hack and slash style that requires constant movement, and a shallow story that focuses more on gameplay and effects.

name: Kamikaze Lassplanes
summary: Fly and fall for powerful Lassplanes! Discover a hand-crafted anime VN with story-driven arcade shoot-'em-up gameplay. Take part in a romantic story with drama and comedic elements set in a steampunk Kingdom filled with magic and torn by a brutal war. Decide the fate of your country and heart.

name: Kamek's Midnight Flight
summary: Nabbit has stolen the legendary "Miyamoto" book from Kamek's Library. In the wrong hands, this book could cause great danger. Kamek must get it back before the book causes even more chaos!

name: Kase & Thyme: The Manor Rouge
summary: Survival Horror text adventure with multiple paths and outcomes! Uncover the bloody, spooky ongoings at The Manor Rouge, with fiery detectives, Kase & Thyme. Find the missing child, Lancel, before it’s too late. Darkly comedic, inspired by classic B-Horror films.

name: Karate
summary: Karate is a video game for the Atari 2600 originally published by Ultravision in 1982 for NTSC systems, then re-released in the latter half of the 1980s by Froggo. Supposedly the game was designed by black belt Joseph Amelio. In 1991, Digital Press chose Karate as one of the worst Atari 2600 games of all time.

name: Kawaii Mansion: Home Makeover
summary: Loving cute game art and enjoy the pleasure of finding hidden objects in pretty scenes? Kawaii Mansion is the perfect fit for you! Tag along with Noah - a charming landlord who will guide you through the best home design experience as you discover the guests' stories through your distinctive mansion design. Let's get creative, shall we?

name: Katawa Crash
summary: Spinoff of Katawa Shoujo in the vein of Toss the Turtle.

name: Karen the Chicken
summary: A beautiful and nonsense 3D adventure game. You are Karen the chicken and you need to solve puzzles to escape from Mr. Boris' farm. Ways to escape? Several. Your objective? Find them all. Are you up to the challenge? Or are you going to chicken out?

name: Kazu Adventures
summary: Turn-based combat with timed counters. Defeat countless stages of enemies by using your reflexes to counter their attacks and deal massive damage.

name: KardVenture
summary: KardVenture is a survival card game where you play as a legendary hero. Explore mysterious locations, gather resources, build your village and face the challenges ahead, be it a cold blizzard or an orc raid. Stack cards to make combos, craft, build, fight and most important... Survive!

name: Kamaeru: A Frog Refuge
summary: Foster a sanctuary for frogs and restore the biodiversity of the wetlands in Kamaeru, a cozy farming sim where you raise frogs by playing mini-games and decorating your habitat. Hop right to it!

name: Katanirvana
summary:
The year is 2057. Society has digressed to corporate feudalism.

Enter Tris, an ex-mercenary on a vengeance mission to kill the Tech-Baron who ruined her life. Master her cyberkatana to mow down enemies, utilize powerful drugs to augment her capabilities, and progress through the Zen battle system to kill the Baron in this dark cyberpunk revenge story.

name: Kaardik
summary: Join the exciting world of Kaardik, a creature collection game. Embark on exciting adventures with your Kaardiks in the fascinating region of Kodumaa. Capture all the Kaardiks, battle with other trainers, and beat the king.

name: Kaiten Puyoman Kuu Carbuncle
summary: Released in Disc Station Volume 25.

name: Karryn's Prison: Gym Trainer Side Job
summary: The Gym, the final sanctuary where inmates can just be men, and workout in peace, free from any other desires or wants. That is, until a certain purple hair Chief Warden decides to turn the table.

name: Katarina's Farm
summary: A mini farming simulator game of "My Next Life as a Villainess! All Routes Lead to Doom!". Let's make our own Katarina farm with cute pixel characters!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Summer Drip
summary: While everyone else drips with sweat, Kao is dripping with style! The free Summer Drip DLC adds two costumes to Kao’s wardrobe!

name: Karamu
summary: Two weeks ago, Nelli sent her long-term boyfriend, Raku, the following text: "I'm breaking up with you." She has been successfully avoiding him ever since...until her bike chain breaks. He helps her, but now she's trapped in a forest with only her broken bike, a cellphone with no reception, and her slightly creepy ex-boyfriend for company. He wants to talk, and one thing is clear: he really doesn't want to break up. (He probably won't take no for an answer.)

name: Kawatare
summary: Kawatare is a 3D adventure game based on the Fukushima Daiichi disaster. Taking place a month after the incident, the game provides a post-disaster scenario in which through its exploration, the player will discover more about the protagonist, the city, and its inhabitants.

name: Katamari Damacy Reroll & We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie
summary: This bundle includes the two remastered games for the Katamari series.

name: Kakuhina
summary: Here is the video game “Kakuhina”! Released in 2004 on Windows. It's an action game, set in an anime / manga, fighting and 2d fighter maker themes.

name: Kalikan
summary: Kalikan is a vertically scrolling bullet hell 'shmup inspired by Dodonpachi- pushing the limits of ~virtual~ hardware . Control one of 3 1 ship(s) featuring two varied attack modes . Maintain your chain to compete for the highest scores.

name: Kawaii Kingdom
summary: A horror visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Kami in My House
summary: Kami in my House is Eternarration's first product. It's a short visual novel voiced in English.

name: Kagami no Kuni no Legend
summary:
Kagami no Kuni no Legend is a Japanese-style first-person adventure game. The player interacts with the game world by selecting verb commands from a menu and combining them with objects or characters. Commands such as "Examine" or "Talk" appear at most screens; if an object can be taken, an appropriate command is displayed after the player has thoroughly examined a location. There is also an inventory with items that must be used at specific moments; however, there are no real puzzles in the game. Navigation is done by selecting the "Move" command; in a few locations the player navigates the hero with directional buttons in a pseudo-3D environment. Wrong choices may sometimes lead to a Game Over.

Most of the background and character graphics is done in anime style, with the exception of Noriko herself, who appears in digital photos, sometimes accompanied by song performances.

name: Kaiju Princess 2
summary: Journey across the galaxy with a cute kaiju and her ravenous appetite as you collect ingredients to cook up the ultimate feast!

name: Karpatia: Order of the Comet
summary: Karpatia is a narrative-driven first-person mystery game, emphasizing the exploration and uncovering of secrets. Help the hero unravel the mystery of an ancient book and stop a dangerous organization that is preparing a global catastrophe. Solve puzzles, explore the castle and its surroundings.

name: Kamigami: Spirits of the Nature
summary: Get ready for another card battling adventure on Kamigami! Easy to play, hard to master, collect brand new cards, face over 80 opponents, build your strategies and restore peace to the gods!

name: Katuba's Poacher
summary: ''Wanted!!'' Chatch the Adoarble 'Sharp' for Reward! "Katuba's Poacher" is Boss-Battle action game with a cartoon and animation style.

name: Kasplat
summary:
Choose your dart, lock'n'load your color palette and rain colorful chaos in this brilliant bonanza of messy mayhem.
Fight for the high-score with multiple game modes, epic powerups and deeper strategy than meets the eye in Kasplat.

name: Kawaii Pet Shop Monogatari 2
summary:
Similar to its predecessor, this is an animal-raising RPG adding more animals and improvements.

The protagonist's father, who runs a pet shop, goes missing after a shipwreck. The protagonist takes over the pet shop management and embarks on an adventure with her exceptional pets to find clues about her father's whereabouts.

name: Kazoe Meshi
summary: Have you ever wondered how many grains of rice are in your bowl when you are eating white rice? This game is a very simple game in which all you have to do is count the rice grains in the bowl. You will never have to worry about how many grains of rice are in your bowl again.

name: Kakutou Bijin Wulong
summary: Kakutou Bijin Wulong (Fighting Beauty Wulong) is an action fighting game based on the manga and anime series created by Yugo Ishikawa and TMS Entertainment. The single-player story follows the plot of the anime unchanged, giving the player a chance to take part in many of the fights from the original series. The game itself is a full-3D beat-'em-up style brawler, and the goal of each stage is to simply defeat every enemy. Ran has a wide variety of different fighting techniques available to her, and can even switch between several different fighting styles on the fly. Items can also be collected that will let the player use extra-damaging special moves. In addition to the main story mode, there is also a two-player versus mode.

name: KatataK
summary: Spearhead the resistance and fight your way across a war-torn London in story mode; Team up with awesome mercenaries to save the world! Battle an endless horde of interstellar kitties in survival mode to unlock new weapons and playable characters.

name: Kagi wo Kakushita Kago no Tori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key
summary: Kagi wo Kakushita Kago no Tori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key is a mystery visual novel where the main character and four heroines who live in a mansion work together to solve a murder that took place in their town.

name: Kagitori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key
summary: Kagitori: Bird in Cage Hiding the Key is the western release of the mystery visual novel where the main character and four heroines who live in a mansion work together to solve a murder that took place in their town.

name: Kart Life
summary: Download now and start your quest for karting glory!

name: Kapi Hospital
summary: It’s a popular saying that laughter is the best medicine. The whimsical hospital game Kapi Hospital, offers its players a truly unique browser game-scenario that comes with a wide array of funny features. As young doctor, it’s your task in this game to build your own hospital, equip yourself with truly extraordinary remedies, treat patients suffering from mad diseases, place different treatment rooms and explore the towns of Sniffleton and Fractureford. On top of that, you’ll face thrilling emergency operations, alien-invasions and evil MDs. Experience the exciting upjers-game and play along entirely for free.

name: Kaiser of Singularity
summary:
A fourth-year expelled student returns to his hometown, hoping to reconnect with old friends.
While hacking into the abyss of the unconscious, he will search for answers to numerous questions: how to overcome alienation, how to restore the course of time, and why this world is imprisoned either in the past or in somebody else's future.
Surveillance cameras, protective rituals, videotapes with old films, secret networks outside the networks, the search for oneself and one's place in reality.
What of this is real and what is psychosis which resulted from a man-made disaster?

name: Karnal
summary: Outnumbered, outgunned, and alone, your only objective is to find your wife. Traverse horrific facilities, city streets, and apartment buildings while fighting various kinds of enemies in this old-school shooter.

name: Kandyland
summary: Kandyland is a single player horror game in which you must outwit beloved characters that once brought you joy, in order to escape the park.

name: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced
summary: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced is a big update for Kaizo Mario Galaxy (2018), rebalancing the difficulty curve and adding new boss battles.

name: Kannagi Usagi
summary:
Sword fight action dedicated to boss battles.
Win the battle by dominating sword to sword clashes.

name: KataPazz
summary: A puzzle game by tilting or moving your phone.

name: Kaun Banega Crorepati
summary: Do you love game show trivia? Have you always dreamed of taking home the win from a game show? Now you can, with the Official Kaun Banega Crorepati Trivia Game. Based on the hit game show, now you can show off your game show trivia knowledge and win big!

name: Kaibutsu Para-Dice
summary: A Role-Playing game, developed and published by Make, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Kappa Kanji Adventure
summary: "Kappa Kanji Adventure" is an innovative and educational platformer game that combines the excitement of fast-paced jumping challenges with the intricate art of learning Kanji characters. Player embark on a thrilling adventure where their linguistic and platforming skills are put to the test.

name: Kalimour
summary: Kalimour is a deep hex-based city-building strategy game where you explore hostile lands and create a vast and prosperous domain. Expand your borders, fend off hostiles and grow your land into the most prosperous kingdom in the world.

name: Kamiji
summary: Kamiji is a Japanese-learning AR trading card game that finds magic in the mundane! Following a volcanic eruption the creatures known as Kami were propelled out of the earth. They were lost and had no homes... But fortunately the ancient humans of China and Japan had hoped and anticipated that they would come home. And forged their entire writing system of the image of the Kami, knowing that one day they would have domains to return to. So the Kami finding these shrine-like remembrances of themselves buried themselves within the kanji. They might've gone completely unnoticed had it not been for a team of scientists who developed a new technology in the form of an app, called Kamiji. Players can use it to scan kanji characters on outdoor billboards that were covered in volcanic ash of the eruption to capture and tame the Kami living within each kanji character.

name: Kart Crazy Race Simulator Game
summary: Fast and dynamic kart races, if you are craving it and looking for it, Kart Crazy Race Simulator will not make you bored.

name: Kairai Inn
summary: A score-attack action game where you aim for high scores by subduing dangerous "kairai."

name: Kanosen: My Girlfriend is a Naughty Teacher
summary: Hatori Yuu has a problem: his sex drive is so ridiculously strong it's disrupting his day to day life. Lucky for him, Kaori-sensei is determined to help him enjoy his school life! And so begins their secretive school affair...

name: Kakuro
summary: This is a pure Kakuro puzzle.

name: Kaikan
summary: Kaikan is a vertical scrolling shooter that focuses on destroying enemies. Destroy enemies with 6 types of aircraft with different performance, clear 5 stages, and aim for a higher score.

name: Kaleidola
summary: Kaleidola is a first-person action puzzle game with a kaleidoscope-inspired twist. Dive into the mind-bending world and unlock powers that transform objects, obstacles, and paths with the click of a button to overcome seemingly impossible dead-ends. Discover what your creativity can achieve.

name: Kagaku na Hatsumei to Hakken no Quiz
Karting Superstars
summary: Karting Superstars is a charming racing game that captures the exciting and competitive world of karting. Inspired to condense the thrill and beauty of racing, we've dedicated our love, time, and craft into this new game that builds on the celebrated simcade taste of Circuit Superstars.

name: Karen's Fault
summary: Join Karen in her uphill battle. But remember, there will be a lot of anger in this adventure...

name: Kakele Online: MMORPG - Bonanza
summary: Are you ready for the new content ranging levels 50-800+? Discover the new dwarven mountains and mines and go deep in exploration of their caves. Join us to explore all the new features of this Major Update!

name: Karoshi: Suicide Salaryman
summary:
"Karoshi" is a Japanese word and means "death by overwork". In this game many things are not what you'd expect and the goal of each level is counter-intuitive: you need to die.

Each stage presents a new challenge. There are several objects you can use to solve puzzles, and in later levels the game will even break it's own rules to surprise you.

50 clever levels and a boss fight at the end. We hope you have fun (killing yourself)!

name: Katapila
summary: Net Yaroze game by Ben James.

name: Kanji Kitchen: Learn Japanese
summary: Welcome to Kanji Kitchen! A unique fusion of cooking and language learning. From mochi-making to mastering Hiragana, Katakana, 2000+ Kanji, and the most essential words, your kitchen is your classroom.

name: Kamla
summary: Play as an Indian exorcist who is tasked with banishing the evil spirit that’s taken over a newly-wed woman named Kamla, in this first person horror game inspired by Indian traditions and folklore.

name: Kaizo Block
summary: A tough, 2D, pixel-art platformer. Overcome 8 progressively more difficult Kaizo-style levels, or try and see how fast you can finish an already completed level. On this journey, momentum, jumps, air dashes, and frequent checkpoints are your friend. The world is your enemy.

name: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Vol. 1
summary: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Top Hit 20 Vol. 1 is the first add-on for the Karaoke video game Karaoke Studio, featuring twenty additional songs. It cannot be played without the original cartridge and microphone peripheral. All the game modes themselves remain unchanged.

name: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Vol. 2
summary: Karaoke Studio Senyou Cassette Top Hit 20 Vol. 2 is the second add-on for the Karaoke video game Karaoke Studio, featuring twenty additional songs. It cannot be played without the original cartridge and microphone peripheral. All the game modes themselves remain unchanged.

name: Kardashev
summary: Kardashev is a first-person, space set, open world, factory building game.

name: Karakuri Ninpou
summary: Arcade ninja game.

name: Kanji Combi: Yakuzumo
summary: Practice and test your kanji knowledge! Drag and drop components to form the right kanji in the right place. While you learn, you help an overweight buffoon cheat his way through his first official sumo match! Some knowledge of Japanese language is required to play.

name: Kaleido Festival
summary: Kaleido Star Fangame.

name: Kaisen! Ika Gundan!
summary: Select one of two options at the beginning of each round to build up your forces and try to take out the evil army of squids and their commander!

name: Katei no Igaku: DS de Kitaeru Shokuzai Kenkou Training
Kaiichi Otto-sensei Tokyo Daigaku Kanshuu: Suku-suku Kosodate DS - Akachan to Asobou!
Kaikan Phrase: Datenshi Kourin
summary: Kaikan Phrase is a music simulation game, much like the Beat Mania series. The story goes around a band called Aucifer in their road to stardom.

name: Katekyou Hitman Reborn! DS: Fate of Heat III - Yuki no Shugosha Raishuu!
Katekyou Hitman Reborn!: Ore ga Boss! Saikyou Family Taisen
Katei de Dekiru! Chomeijin Yuumei Ryourinin no Original Recipe - Shokusai Roman
Kaze no Tansakusha: Grand Slam
summary: A Japanese rogue-like RPG developed by Gruppo One. The game's aesthetics are influenced by tabletop gaming, with the characters designed to look like figurines moving through dioramas.

name: Kaze no Tansakusha 2: Shadow Kingdom
summary: The direct sequel to Kaze no Tansakusha: Grand Slam. It retains the series' tabletop-inspired aesthetics, with characters depicted as figurines on a game board.

name: Kamitsubaki City Regenerate
summary: Answer the summons to the parallel world of "Kamitsubaki City" and meet a cast of colorful characters as you set out on a quest to save this city from the brink of destruction in this dark-fantasy sci-fi visual novel!

name: Kana Ka-Boom
summary: Kana Ka-Boom is for those interested in starting their journey of learning the Japanese language, and for those looking for a fun way to practice and retain their Katakana and Hiragana skills.

name: Katsl
summary: Welcome to Katsl, the island town for cats! Unleash your inner architect and craft cozy nooks for your adorable kittizens. Dive into their world, discover their dreams and quirks, and weave them into your feline tale. Time to unwind and let your paw-some adventure begin!

name: Kanzen Chuukei Pro Yakyuu Greatest Nine
summary: Greatest Nine began on the Sega Saturn in 1995. New releases in the series stopped for a while after 1998. However, it was revived in 2002 on the Game Boy Advance (GBA). This Game Boy Advance version has developed by Smilebit (absorbed by Sega in 2004), behind the Motto Pro Yakyuu Team o Tsukurou! franchise.

name: KaiseR Land 01
summary: A level which explores the under-exploited aquatic base theme

name: KaiseR Land 02
summary: The map begins exactly where its predecessor left and infiltrates even deeper into the deep sea. However, everything gets spicier when you get out of the base and confront a peculiar world of uncertainty.

name: KaiseR Land 03
summary: The highly-anticipated sequel to KaiseR Land 02 takes place (unlike its predecessors) in an medieval environment, a theme which has not been stumbled upon too many times, surrounded by lovely decorations and the typical alien vermin afoot.

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble
summary: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble is a rhythm game in the world of destruction.

name: Kanye Zone
summary: Kanye Zone is a high-score based parody game where you try to stop Kanye West from getting into his zone.

name: Karoshi Mario
summary: This is Karoshi Mario, based off of the original game by Jesse Venbrux. In case you never played Karoshi before, the objective is to kill yourself. That's it. It's harder than it may sound sometimes, though. The objective of this game is not to emulate the original, but to put Mario in a similar type of situation.

name: Kagidoko: A Deep Learning Horror Game
summary: Kagidoko is an experimental horror game where every jumpscare has a reason. Collect all keys, open all doors, and get out of that house... While being stalked by a Deep Learning Gameplay AI.

name: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3
summary: A remaster of Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 (Legend of the River King GB), more specifically the Game Boy Color version, called Legend of the River King GBC in North America. It was released inside the Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 & 4 bundle.

name: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 4
summary: A remaster of Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 4 (Legend of the River King 2) released inside the Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 & 4 bundle.

name: Karakuri Colosseum
summary: Karakuri Colosseum is a captivating VR sword-fighting experience, set in a Japan-inspired rendition of the ancient Roman Colosseum, where players engage in intense duels against samurai robots with Japanese swords.

name: Kaisho
summary: A Third person fantasy RPG in a fantasy medieval world, sword, katana, axe fighting system where you are a little girl named Hana in the kingdom of Kaisho. Fight against creatures and spiders to free Kaisho from the evil. Step into a fantasy adventure and start your journey. Welcome to Kaisho

name: Kaiserpunk
summary: Build and conquer in Kaiserpunk, the ultimate city builder and grand strategy combo set in an alternative 20th century world. Engage in epic battles on land, sea, and air, or use your economic power to emerge as the ultimate victor.

name: Kabufuda
summary: A kabufuda solitaire game, inspired by Zachtronics, rebuilt + enhanced for playdate

name: Kalis Car Game
summary: Drive your car around open city. Outrun the police or chase down other street racers. Make money to tune your car and race it against other racer on touges and race tracks. Alone or with your friends. Use steering wheel & pedals, controller or keyboard and mouse. Enjoy the driving physics!

name: Karasu Meltdown!
summary:
Karasu Meltdown puts you into the elephant's foot of hell raven Utsuho Reiuji, who thought it'd be a fun idea to smash up the Palace of Earth Spirits!

But Satori's having none of it and sending all of her pets to stop her!
Shoot, dodge, bomb, and raise bullet hell in this caravan shoot 'em up!
This game was originally made in three weeks for the Gunner Parade '22 Winter League game jam.

name: Kagura Genesis: Kuon's Story
summary: Vanquish and recruit youkai in randomized dungeons in Kagura Genesis: Kuon's Story, a replayable roguelike RPG!

name: Katana Robo: RTA
summary: Katana Robo fights his way to the top floor of the Robot Tower, which looks like a platformer game stage, to thwart Samurai Robo's ambitious plan to use the Dominion Sphere at the top of the Robot Tower to control the robots throughout the universe.

name: Kaiki LoopDown
summary: You wake up in an unfamiliar building. You have to get out of here. You go down the stairs and go down the corridor to reach the same stairs again. The world repeats itself over and over, but each time it repeats itself, something changes. Eternal return. Can you escape from this looping world?

name: Kameo: Elements of Power
summary: The unreleased version of Kameo: Elements of Power for the N64, Nintendo GameCube, and later the Xbox.

name: Kazoo
summary:
The third phase of development of the game which would later get released as Banjo-Kazooie, Kazoo now stars Banjo instead of Edson, but the gameplay would still be in a top-down view, now as a 2.5D adventure platformer, with a grid-based movement system. Banjo would wear sports clothing as means of power-ups.

The game was later reworked into a collect-a-thon 3D platformer, abandoning the sports motif in favor of a fantasy and comedy setting, when it was released as Banjo-Kazooie.

name: Kameo 2
summary: An unreleased sequel to Kameo: Elements of Power.

name: Kainga: Thinker Outfits Supporter Pack
summary: Love Kainga and want to dive deeper into the lore? Want to give back to the development of Kainga? This official Kainga support pack is a cosmetics-only DLC that allows you to switch the outfits of all 8 Thinkers to newly designed alternatives for that extra bit of flair!

name: Kanjozoku: Wangan Runners
summary: Forged Pistons, Ball-bearing Turbo, Sequential Gearbox, RB26 under the hood! Ignite your passion for '90s Japanese street racing in Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners. Race across 100+ km of open roads, from highways to tunnels and connect with players in a dynamic online community.

name: Kaitei Taisensou!! Treasure World
summary: An adventure game where you travel around the world to find your friends and legendary treasures. You can enjoy the real thrill of the eternal theme "Treasure Hunt" that everyone is interested in. In order to break the seal of the ancient civilization, the main character becomes a treasure hunter looking for the ancient civilization that has sunk to the seabed due to crustal movement, and with the hint of the treasure called Great Treasure that sleeps in the seas around the world, the legendary treasure World Treasure Go on a voyage to look for it. Make full use of various items such as a variety of mini games and submarines to raise treasure.

name: Kanji Boy 3
summary: The third installment of "Kanji BOY" that makes you smarter while playing games. The number of questions recorded is over 7,000! As you play, you will naturally acquire kanji. There are two game modes. There is a "existing question collection mode" where you can play the exams from the 2nd to 10th grades that have been asked in the past, and a "mini game mode" where you can get idioms about your body, health, animals, and living.

name: Kanji de Puzzle
summary: You can enjoy the world of puzzle game magazines published in various ways on GB. Most of the kanji to be asked are 1006 kanji learned in the 1st to 6th grades of elementary school. Acquire perfect while playing antonyms, synonyms, stroke order, okurigana, homophones and idioms. There are four types of games: Kanji quiz "Spartan Z", Kanji crossword "Kankuro", "Kanji puzzle", and original puzzle "Elephant Dragon". It can also be used as a kanji learning tool for children from general education.

name: Karan Koron Gakuen: Hanafuda - Mahjong
summary: The familiar classic game Hanafuda and Mahjong are coupled with GBC. A unique feature of handheld game consoles, you can easily enjoy Hanafuda and Mahjong anywhere. Let's enjoy the game with 16 cute Hanaran Toryu Gakuen girls who appear in the game. Hanafuda is based on the basic rule of "Koikoi", and there are three modes: "Tournament mode" where you can win out, "Dan certification mode" where you can be certified by winning, and "Competition mode" where you can play against your friends. Mahjong is a three-player mode with four players: "brute force mode" where you can play against all characters, "computer mode" where you can play a tournament-style battle, and "competition mode" where you can enjoy playing against friends.

name: Kamishiro Gakuen Maboroshi Kouroku Kuru Nugia
summary:
An infamous kusoge released in Japan for the PlayStation 2. Kamishiro Gakuen Maboroshi Kouroku Kuru NuGiA, often just shortened to "Nugya", is about a story that unfolds in both modern times and the Taisho era, surrounding the "Kamiyori" that occurs once every 100 years in the town of Jindai. The main characters, one in the modern era and one in the Taisho era, both help to fight against demons.

Battles are turn-based, including a system in which you can use interchangeable skills. There is a "feeling system" that responds with "joy, anger, sadness, or pleasure" depending on the situation, but it has almost no relationship with the progress of the main game.

name: Kaos
summary: The player has to climb a vertical maze which walls are moving back and forth horizontally - all the while evading enemies and collecting coins.

name: Kanto Expansion Pak
summary: The Kanto Expansion Pak is a ROM hack of Pokémon Red that expands the chromatic generation with scrapped Pokémon, regional variants, and cross-gen evolutions. It attempts to remain as faithful as possible to the game's design specification while doing this, ensuring that RBY OU does not deviate significantly from its roots. Thus, it doesn't include generational gimmicks like Mega Evolution, it simply aims to port what is technically possible in a vanilla Gen 1. It also aims to be compatible with any Gen 1 metagame, allowing tiers like Monotype, LC, NFE, Nintendo Cups, and more to be at least playable for the average user. The original Pokémon are left completely unchanged and balanced around.

name: Kaiki Sando
summary: "Kaiki Sando" is a horror game exploring ancient secrets and yokai in Japan's mountains. Players encounter supernatural events and choose paths at mysterious torii gates, affecting the story.

name: Kalia and The Fire Staff
summary: A fiery top-down dungeon crawling adventure.

name: Kawã na Terra dos Indígenas Maraguá
summary: Kawã na Terra dos Indígenas Maraguá is an educational platformer developed by the Federal University of São Carlos, under its LEETRA laboratory. It tells the story of a young indigenous boy who goes through the Wakaripé ritual. According to the tradition that marks the transition from childhood to adulthood, when boys turn ten, they must pass some tests to demonstrate their bravery. Then, at the age of 15, they face the even more challenging Gualipãg ritual, which entitles them to become "chief hunter-warrior".

name: Kanau
summary:
Prequel to "Karamu".

On the eve of his tenth birthday, Rakuo Kumode undergoes his family’s “initiation rite.” When he bucks against his family traditions, he has an encounter that will change the course of his life forever.

name: Kako Yatai
summary: Rumored urban legend "Past stall" It is said that the stall "can return to the past you regret only once"...

name: Kaitou Saint Tail: Saint Tail to One, Two, Three!
summary: Released for Sega Pico on December 1995 in Japan only, and the first game based on the manga and anime Kaitou Saint Tail.

name: Kaiki: Okujou no Yuurei to Akuma no Gishiki
summary: Maybe nothing happened... Or maybe something did. A fleeting moment from an ordinary high school day. A exploration horror game set in a school at night.

name: Kagami: An Odyssey in Japanese Language Learning
summary: Retro-style RPG themed around finding and learning vocabulary words in Japanese, playing minigames, and using discovered vocabulary to gain advantages when fighting enemies based on yokai from Japanese folklore.

name: Katamar1k
summary:
An homage to Katamari Damacy for Pico8 in 1021 bytes for the #PICO1k jam.

Collect enough things with your Katamari ball to reach 64cm as fast as possible to please the King of all Cosmos.

name: Kakkouke
summary: An all age-oriented BL different world adventure visual novel game. The hero Kai, who is a brave but a disadvantaged character, will start a thrilling adventure story with people (fish) with different personalities who will meet during the adventure.

name: Kawaii Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Kamikaze
summary: Try to avoid getting sunk by enemy bombers while you are trying to shoot them down.

name: Katamari
summary: A fanmade Katamari game for the Atari 2600.

name: Karos Classic
summary: The living legend returns in his original form! The Сlassic version of Karos, untouched by years and updates. Maximum level, sharpening level is limited.

name: Kami no Machi
summary: A PC visual novel game.

name: Kasumi
summary:
Kasumi, who was my close friend, died more than 10 years ago after jumping off the school's rooftop. He was a lonely boy who wanted to die with me.

I broke my promise to die with him and ran away, and I'm the only one left alive.

Since then, I've dreamed of Kasumi over and over again.

―I still dream of him today.

name: Karate Champ
summary: Single players compete against a computer opponent while two players fight each other in this Karate game. Players each use two joysticks which allow for a variety of different moves. The best two matches, out of three, wins.

name: Kami: Parade of Senses
summary: The parade of senses begins and you are forced to become its participant. So make the most of the situation! Explore the Kami Space, help to other forced, who have been trapped here, look for answers to questions, betray, kill... or spare and protect.

name: Kaiju Cracking Corp
summary: Only powerful robots can stand against the Kaiju that infest the world! Once the monster is defeated, it's time for Cracking!"Kaiju Cracking Corp." is a simulation game where you can experience everything from defeating Kaiju to selling their parts.

name: Karamu Trilogy
summary: A trilogy of dark, horror romance visual novels about a girl and her ex-boyfriend who refuses to leave her alone. Voice acted with animated illustrations. Contains the games "Karamu," "Kanau," and "Hanasu."

name: Kanhoji's Island
summary: Welcome to 'Kanhoji's Island'! Join the thrilling Ludo adventure where cunning strategy meets pirate conquest. Roll the dice, outmanoeuvre rivals, and become the ultimate master of the high seas. Will you reign supreme in this epic battle for dominance?

name: Karina Katana
summary: A "Sidescroller" Adventure with Fight Mechanics and Leveling System for your skills and items.

name: Kart Race Kimete wa Drift!
summary: Compete against six go-kart racers from out of this world to determine who is the best driver is. Grab turbo capsules to stay ahead of the pack, Avoid a mayraid of obstacles set in place to twart even the savviest of drivers, Power-slide around tight hairpin turns to record new times. Ready-Set-Go

name: Kawaii Hentai Sexy Girls
summary: Kawaii Hentai Sexy Girls is a puzzle game in which all you need is to assemble a mosaic to restore the pictures.But please remember that the purpose of this game is to make you relax and enjoy life.

name: Kary
summary: Kary, an intriguing suspense game where you take on the role of a brave girl who finds herself alone and her house is being haunted by ghosts. Face your fears as you explore the dark rooms and hallways, where ghosts lurk in the shadows.

name: Kaiju Wars + Legend of Keepers: Monsters & Demons Bundle
summary: Get two awesome turn-based games: Kaiju Wars and Legend of Keepers!

name: Kanjozoku Game: Car Racing & Highway Driving Simulator Games
Kao no nai Tsuki Select Story
summary: A fandisc to Kao no nai Tsuki and is a Suzuna after story. Included in the Touka Gettan: Koufuu no Ryouou Deluxe Pack.

name: Kadie's Uncanny Valley
summary: Time stands still in Kadie's Uncanny Valley. Deep below the surface lies a failed invention. Her name is Kadie, said to be the first truly life-like doll. Use every aspect of the environment to your survival, avoid what’s hiding in the shadows, and find out for yourself how truly life-like Kadie is

name: Kaiju Wars + Legend of Keepers: Monsters & Demons Deluxe Bundle
summary: Get two awesome turn-based games: Kaiju Wars and Legend of Keepers!

name: Karnov
summary: The NES port of Karnov. In the game, players take control of the title character Jinborov Karnovski, or "Karnov" for short. Karnov is a strongman popularly illustrated as being from an unspecified part of the Soviet Union's Central Asian republics as shown on the original arcade flyer and again in Karnov's Revenge.

name: Katana's Path
summary: Katana's Path is a fast-paced arena arcade slasher, where you can control your samurai and your katana in a unique game mechanic. Slash through many enemies at a rainy cyberpunk city or colorful forests using the best gear you can get!

name: Kashido
summary: A masterpiece board game on the theme of Japanese sweets!

name: Kaidro: Clan Battles
summary: Kaidro: Clan Battles is near-isometric multiplayer ARPG, that expands on top of the hit comic series Kaidro: The Awakening. Choose a clan, engage in competitive multiplayer battles, and beware of rivals and sinister forces from the Void. Alpha release imminent!

name: Kao the Kangaroo: VIP
summary:
Get the VIP look!
Future proof your fashion sense with this all new DLC pack for Kao The Kangaroo!
The VIP DLC pack contains three sci-fi themed costumes including - Space Knight, Robotic, and Future Punk. All three sets can be mixed and matched with previous cosmetics, adding a galaxy of options to your fashion choices!

name: Kao The Kangaroo: Top Of The Class
summary: You might not make smart moves, but at least you can dress like you do! Containing two full outfits (made up for four items) Kao can now dress with that big brain energy or mix it up to add a dash of class to an outfit, all without costing a thing!

name: Kaidann
summary: You are trapped in a strange staircase, and you must determine what is happening here and head for the exit, which is on the first floor.

name: Kaiwa
summary: A psychic horror sound novel developed in an omnibus format.

name: Kawaii Puzzle: Girl Adventure
summary: Engage in exciting puzzles with charming anime girls, progress through new levels, participate in dialogues, and earn well-deserved rewards! Embark on adventures with adorable anime characters awaits you

name: Kanon
summary: An expanded port of Kanon that added voice acting to all characters, minus the protagonist.

name: Kanon: Best Edition
summary: An enhanced port of Kanon for the PlayStation that adds progressive output, a flicker-free function, and a higher sampling rate.

name: Kanon: Standard Edition
summary: A port of Kanon: Best Edition that brings the extra CGs from the console versions and Windows 2000/XP support.

name: Kanon
summary: A port of Kanon on the PlayStation Portable, featuring the CGs in widescreen, adding voice-acting to the main protagonist and a 'Capture' option to save any scene in the game to Memory Stick.

name: Kanon
summary: A mobile port of Kanon.

name: Kanon: Memorial Edition
summary: A port of Kanon with support for Windows Vista/7.

name: Kanon
summary: Android port of Kanon.

name: Kanon
summary: iOS port of Kanon.

name: Kanon
summary: The remastered version of Kanon, which features the CGs in high definition and color corrected and includes full voice-acting utilizing both recordings made in the Dreamcast/PS2 and PSP releases of the game (minus Shiori, whose non-PSP lines were newly recorded) and touchscreen support.

name: Karporam
summary: A beat em up/fighting game inspired by fighting games from the 90s, as well as shounen anime.

name: Kamura: Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha
summary:
Kamura - Kamigami to Chigiri Shisha - is a Japanese-style fantasy RPG that depicts a magnificent story of gods and humans on the stage of "the country of sunrise". In order to stop my brother who fell into darkness, make a contract with 8 million gods who exist in various places and hit the darkness with the ultimate secret technique!!

A shocking and moving story!
In addition to familiar gods and monsters such as "Amaterasu" and "Tsukuyomi", there are items that you have heard at least once, such as the three sacred treasures, appear everywhere! A story of laughter and tears, shock and excitement by attractive friends unfolds.

A system that boosts battles! The "God Drop" system that allows you to use unique secret techniques by possessing the gods to yourself, and the "Gogyo Soi-Oi" system, which changes damage depending on the attributes of the gods possessed by the characters and the attributes of enemies, etc., make the strategy of the battle. I'll increase it more.

It's also full of rushing elements! In addition to various weapons and monsters that appear in the game, there are also plenty of collection elements that complete the picture book by encountering gods! Various rushing elements are prepared, such as dungeons that appear only under specific conditions.

After clearing, there will be further adventures... If you meet certain conditions, the following three sacred treasures will appear on the title screen, and you can play the bonus elements by collecting all of them

name: Katana Dynasty
summary: Every decision you make shapes the destiny of Kaito and the fate of the city. Will you choose the path of honor, exposing the truth and restoring justice, or succumb to the allure of power and manipulation?

name: Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony
summary: Kalpa, the authentic mobile 5-key rhythm game, is now available on STEAM! The doomed universe needs you to play your life away. Play your life's music with Kalpa to save the dying Yggdrasil and revive the universe!

name: Kami
summary: Embark on the ultimate adventure in "Kami," a game that seamlessly blends action-packed roguelike exploration with deep strategic elements. Navigate through ever-evolving dungeons, harness the power of unique pets through evolution, and unlock extraordinary abilities.

name: Karin's Instruction
summary: Drive tanks, blast through everything, and engage in intimate interactions with Coach Karin.

name: Kalahari’s End
summary: After your plane crashes, You find yourself in one of the largest abandoned tourist locations in South Africa. Build, Craft, and create your character while combatting the intense heat of the Kalahari Desert in this upcoming realistic open-world survival simulation game.

name: Kart Them All
summary: Face your friends in this frenetic party-game! Dodge attacks with your kart and send your enemies flying off the track with bonus items thanks to its excessive physics.

name: Kalevala: Where Heroes Go to Die
summary: Kalevala: Where Heroes Go to Die is a narrative-driven text-based game inspired by Finnish mythology. It is an alternate continuation to our national epic and an exploration in what gives myths their power.

name: Kajko i Kokosz 2: Cucuny Lek
summary: Kajko i Kokosz 2: Cucuny Lek is another (after School of Flying ) adventure and arcade game, intended for young computer users (from 6 years old), enabling the players to take on the role of two titular heroes known from Janusz Christy's comics. This time, Kajko and Kokosz set off on a journey to find a medicine that will heal Castellan Mirmił, who was insidiously infected with a cold by evil robbers.

name: Kajko i Kokosz: Szkoła Latania
summary: Another adventure and arcade game, after Kajko and Kokosz in the Land of Borostworów, intended for children (from four years old), entirely based on the cult comic book by Janusz Christy, or more precisely - on the volume "Szkoła lania".

name: Kajko i Kokosz: Mirmiłowo Wielkie
summary: The plot of the story focuses on the conspiracy of an evil sorcerer who plans to take over the family town of our heroes. As you can easily guess, the two inseparable friends will quickly decipher his intentions and try to thwart the villain's evil plans. In this chapter of the game, we witness the arrival of a mysterious merchant named Hodon to Mirmiłów. By giving the Castellan a vision of building a stone fortress, the villain quickly ingratiates himself with him, leading to a drastic increase in taxes and sidelining Kajko and Kokosz. However, the fearless warriors decide to regain their former influence and help the Castellan, who is unknowingly getting into more and more trouble.

name: KanjiMemory
summary: Increase your grasp of Japanese kanji character readings by playing rounds of classic Memory game where you try to find and match kanji and their readings.

name: KarmaRun
summary: KarmaRun is an endless runner in which players can control some of the most famous youtubers in Spain. Or rather not, since by default we will control a generic character, and we will need to pay money if we want to control any of these youtubers.

name: Kanenone Dynatic: Green Green
summary: An expanded version of Green Green which includes the four new heroines initially added in Kanenone Dynamic and Kanenone Romantic with brand-new erotic scenes.

name: Kanashimi Arabesque
summary:
I have a wonderful boyfriend. His name is Yuuki Kiryuu, we just started dating.
He's cool and kind, a boyfriend to be proud of. To know his older brother was the pianist I once admired...

name: Kazu Aether Origins
summary: Kazu Aether Origins is a non-linear hack-slash action adventure on the Isles of Isvenness. Play as a Finnish Spitz as you overcome combat challenges, explore a world of vibrant handcrafted environmental art, and interact with satirical elements for a light-hearted, action-packed gameplay experience.

name: Karga
summary: In the game "Karga," players become hero defenders aided by a dragon to battle the witch Hag and her dark army. Armed with elemental revolvers and special skills, they combat various foes. The hero's abilities and weapons strengthen with each battle.

name: Kart
summary: A kart racer?! On PC?! with Steam Workshop support for tracks, racers, and more?! Playable offline or online, with friends or otherwise!? Yeah, you're not dreaming; this is real!

name: Katzala
summary: Embark on a deeply emotional journey as a cat spirit exploring a troubled village from eastern France. Listen to conversations, manipulate your environment, influence dreams, discover hidden memories and battle buried traumas. Explore mental health and unravel your own story along the way.

name: Katana Of Rin
summary: Slice through darkness to become the greatest samurai. Stealth mode and shurikens add layers of strategy, while grappling hooks require you to navigate with grace.

name: Kanjozoku 2: Drift Car Games
summary: Push your limits and dominate the asphalt in cutthroat street races!

name: Karsus
summary: Guide Karsus the Magician through the caves to search for his magic book, challenge the pumpkin monsters, skeletons, bats, spiders.

name: Kaiju Rush
summary: Ready, aim, and smash cities. Select your favorite Kaiju monster and simply tap to bash buildings to bits and pieces.

name: Kaspar i Nudådalen
summary: Kaspar i Nudådalen is a Swedish adventure/puzzle game based on the Christmas calender TV show of the same name. The game has 24 mini-games that are unlocked with a code that was revealed on TV after that day's episode of the Christmas calendar ("Julkalendern").

name: Kaidop
summary: This game is a single player it has 4 to 5 stages to complete, those stages are very difficult to pass, this game is a challenge to pass those levels, the levels include obey, escape room, dodge ball, and guessing puzzle, and you will Enter the to an Endless runner.

name: Kane no naru Ki
summary:
There is only one objective. Defeat the last boss in front of you.
This is a challenging work game centered on combat.
Character development, skill-based combat,
It is recommended for those who are looking for a challenging level of difficulty.

We do not recommend this game to those who are looking for scenario, story element, exploration and adventure element.

name: Kamisama Spirits of the Shrine
summary: When you accidentally damage a Shinto shrine, you’re forced to pay off your debt by becoming a miko to the handsome spirits who live there—an irritable god, sly fox familiar, and energetic lion-dog guardian.

name: Karabast
summary: Karabast is a fan-made digital recreation of "Star Wars Unlimited", a trading card game set in the Star Wars universe. Players collect cards, build decks, and engage in strategic battles using characters, ships, and planets from the Star Wars saga. Each match offers the opportunity to recreate iconic battles or craft new stories, exploring the rich lore of the galaxy in a quest for dominance.

name: Kanna Maze
summary: In an isolated lab beneath the earth, a childhood friend is resurrected. Amidst sealed walls, a spree of killings unfolds. In a godless abyss, parallel worlds entwine like a maze. Where does one find the path to the sole universe of bliss?

name: Kawaii Evolution Clicker
summary:
Become a senpai for girls in School, among whom present all anime characters, including tsundere, kuudere, yandere and many others.
Visit mansion of Onii-chan, where cute sisters and childhood friend are waiting for you.
The capital of cosplay - Akihabara. In maid cafe you will be met by a kawaii maido, gothic lolita and of course neko-chan.

name: Kaetram
summary: Adventure through a large world, unlock secret areas, complete quests, and collaborate with others to defeat bosses and become the best!

name: Kanoso
summary:
Slapstick parody of Key's Visual Novel Kanon

You play as 17-year-old Yuuichi Aizawa. Having trained in this madder-red city and left on a ascetic travel, you return to your hometown to determine who is the strongest...

name: Kamigoroshi no Aogin
summary: It's an SRPG with a late 90s feel. It's a regional control simulation RPG in which you win battles to expand your army's territory and conquer enemy territory to advance the story.

name: Kai
summary: KAI is a game of Exploration and Adventure between the sidereal space and underwater depths. Skillfully lure and guide groups of fish to solve puzzles, access new areas and uncover the truth behind the mission entrusted to you, Akira, and the other crew members aboard the ship.

name: KartMania Silver
summary: Invite your friends to have fun with you playing KartMania! A Kart game where you race around the tracks in the universe of Silver Games games, use and abuse special items to get ahead of your friends and thus win first place! Speed ​​to glory in KartMania Silver!

name: Kado Hunter
summary: As you are stranded in Vanada, you're meeting the sisters Aya and Chiyo. After you get to know what is happening, you decide to help them. In your journey as KADO HUNTER you will collect KADOS, fight against monsters, solve quests and get ready to explore Vanada.

name: Kadin the Soul Eater
summary: A Story driven game, where choices can branch. Pretend to be a mortal with so called friends.

name: Karting with Animals
summary: "Karting with Animals: The Wild Race" flips the script on traditional racing games, infusing the thrill of speed with the unpredictability of the animal kingdom.

name: Karm: Early Access Archives
summary: KARM brings back '90s FPS look and feel in a lovecraftian world.

name: Karjala
summary: VHS bodycam horror in the atmosphere of Soviet Backrooms. Karelia is a country of rivers, forests and lakes, where the modern world comes in contact with superstitions and ancient rituals. Soldier Solnyshkov agrees to take part in a strange experiment of his command.

name: Kana
summary: Start your Japanese learning journey by learning the fundamentals! In Kana, you get to practice Hiragana and Katakana, which are two of the writing systems in Japanese.

name: Kalasta
summary: Kalasta is a roguelite deckbuilder fish game with real time strategy mechanics. Play cards to spawn fish, feed them and defend your fish from waves of monsters!

name: Kaiju Fury Turbo
summary: Kaiju Fury Turbo is a top-down, couch co-op, non-stop, action adventure. As a kaiju, battle your way from under military control, destroy defense hardened cities, defeat captured kaiju, and become the cataclysm they always feared.

name: Kamen Rider Battle Rush
summary: Kamen Rider Battle Rush is a tower defense RPG mobile game based off the Kamen Rider universe! To commemorate the franchise's 45th anniversary, Kamen Rider Battle Rush will bring you a refreshing experience where you'll control and build your favorite Riders to defend against the marching forces of evil!

name: Kappa's Asylum
summary: Kappa's Asylum is a survival horror game in which you control a youtuber in an abandoned asylum to record a video.

name: Kava
summary: Kava is a new single player experience for Red Faction with an estimated casual playtime of 2-3 hours, putting it roughly on par with the length of the Red Faction base game. Set a short time prior to the events of the Red Faction campaign, Kava casts the player in the role of Kava Xarel.

name: Katekyou Hitman Reborn!: Nerae!? Ring x Vongola Trainers
summary: Katekyou Hitman Reborn!: Nerae!? Ring x Vongola Trainers is a Visual Novel video game published by Marvelous Entertainment released on August 28th, 2008 for the PlayStation 2.

name: Kaiju Feeder
summary: A homebrew for Game Boy in which the player controls an anthropomorphic helicopter who needs to carry food to giant monsters.

name: Kayak VR: Mirage - Soča Valley
summary: Explore the beautiful Soča Valley in Slovenia, known for its iconic green water, mountain vistas and lush nature. Take on a new thrilling challenge by paddling down whitewater rapids or explore the nature of this serene valley at your own pace.

name: Kart Heros Ultra
summary: A micro Racing game, spanning accross multiple levels. Players can race AI with multiplayer and local support coming soon.

name: Kamaitachi no Yoru x3
summary: ​Kamaitachi no Yoru x3 is a collection commemorating the 30th anniversary of the renowned sound novel series "Kamaitachi no Yoru." This compilation includes the main stories of "Kamaitachi no Yoru," "Kamaitachi no Yoru 2," and the series' third and final installment, "Kamaitachi no Yoru x3." Even newcomers can fully enjoy the series, as the relationships between characters and past incidents are thoroughly explored. ​

name: Kana Heroes
summary: Kana Heroes is an educational game that helps you learn to recognize the symbols used in Katakana and Hiragana (collectively called "Kana"), the first two alphabet styles used in the Japanese language. With this knowledge, you'll be able to read words in Japanese.

name: Kain Cobra: Autogun Blaster
summary: Kain Cobra: Autogun Blaster is a 2D rogue-lite fast-paced shooter that blends kawaii charm with neon fury where our lazy anti-hero fights a mysterious intergalactic alien invasion to save Planet Blue!

name: Kaiketsu Zorori: Mezase! Itazura King
summary:
Kaiketsu Zorori: Mezase! Itazura King is a Miscellaneous game based on the popular Japanese children's book character Kaiketsu Zorori, developed and published by Bandai. Released exclusively in Japan in 2004.
Using the EyeToy camera, you can put yourself in the game and appear alongside Zorori, Ishishi and friends. There are nine different types of mischief you can cause -- the ultimate objective is to outdo Zorori himself. There is also a party mode where up to four players compete consecutively to become the King of Pranks.

name: Karate Survivor
summary: Become a martial arts master in this survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Use your fists, feet, and the environment to fight off relentless thugs. Master powerful combos, enhance your skills, and remember: everything around you is a weapon!

name: Kakos
summary:
An upcoming card game where you can duel the underground folk. Explore the caves.
Discover the hidden history. But you should NEVER break the rules!

name: Kaerimichi
summary: An unreal horror adventure where you just go home without looking back.

name: Kajun's Lucid Room
summary: A little collection of mini-games with Kajun-chan. You get an up-close and personal look at Kajun-chan's daily routine in this unique sandbox module from changing clothes, photo shooting with custom posing & dancing and even help Kajun-chan shower !

name: Katawa Shoujo
summary: A censored Steam release of the romantic visual novel set in the fictional Japanese Yamaku High School for disabled children. Hisao's congenital heart defect forces him to move to a new school. Despite his difficulties, Hisao is able to find friends—and perhaps love, if he plays his cards right.

name: Katja's Escape II: The Mad Scientist's Lab
Karma
summary: Explore the mysterious world of hell in this walking simulator. Search for six hearts while encountering strange characters and impressive landscapes. The haunting music, composed for this game, draws you deeper into the depths of hell.

name: Kakuro++
summary: Put your neurons into action 16 difficulty levels for beginners to experts. And lots of tools if you're stuck on a difficult puzzle

name: Kafkaesque: The Nightmare Trial
summary: Experience Kafka's 'The Trial' as a nightmarish survival horror game. Navigate surreal puzzles and face grotesque manifestations of power as you fight for your innocence in a system designed to crush you.

name: Kamisama Kazoku: Ouen Ganbou
summary: Kamisama Kazoku: Ouen Ganbou is a visual novel adaptation of the Kamisama Kazoku anime series.

name: Kaitlin: The Perfect Date
summary: Kaitlyn: The Perfect Date is a character special book with Kaitlyn. As of March 19, 2020, the book is free for everyone. It used to cost 30 diamonds to unlock this book.

name: Kawaii Slime
summary: An idle/clicker game where the player collects slime inventory items over time. Slimes can vary from size, color, shape, and rarity. Some limited slimes maybe released during certain times of the year for a short time so be sure to stay alert for new announcements.

name: Kalimat Karash
summary: Explore the world map by solving the diverse and exciting word puzzles.

name: Katto: Rising Tides
summary: Katto: Rising Tides is a funny and dynamic platformer game! Enter the kingdom of Egatlea, face terrible Nari enemies, move and jump between floors and obstacles, and do your best to restore peace for your kingdom.

name: Kawaii Pet Megu
summary: Kawaii Pet Megu was a Japanese virtual pet game for iOS devices.

name: Karpe Diem
summary:
It's that time of year again... Karpe Diem!

The famous festival of the Joisey region which brings travelers from far and wide to compete in a fishing competition overseen by the widely adored Mayor Slowpoke. Set out on adventure to become the next Karpe Diem champion, face off against a worthy rival, meet helpful strangers, and solve thematic puzzles.

This fan-made Pokemon slice of life game strips out longtime series mechanics such as battling, badges, and evolutions to instead focus on things like kicking back, relaxing, and reeling in a whopper.

name: Karma II
summary: Karma II was a Korean first person shooter by DragonFly.

name: Kane TV: The Game
summary: Kane TV: The Game is a tribute game based on the Kane TV channel! Join Kane in his adventure in this cybernetic world, passing through many levels with many references to his YouTube videos!

name: Karaoke Joysound for Streamer
summary:
"Karaoke Joysound for Streamer" offers unlimited singing of tens of thousands of songs that can be live-streamed and video posted!
In addition, there is a scoring game, a singing key change function, and a lyrics message display function, all of which are well-known at karaoke parlors.

name: Kajipeet
summary: Kajipeet is a local multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players. In this game you will have to try on the role of a marshmallow samurai and show your friends who is the main marshmallow here. Katanas, maps, bonuses and a lot of fun!

name: Kavernum
summary: Winston Bradley is an amateur explorer who is always looking for new adventures. His latest destination is a cave in Algeria, which is known for it famous cave paintings. But the further he goes into the cave, the more he realizes that something is wrong with it.

name: Kanade
summary: A visual novel about becoming lovers with Kanade—a half-human, half-alien girl. Enjoy a tender relationship with Kanade and witness how love blossoms into a song that saves the world.

name: Kaya's Prophecy
summary: Kaya’s Prophecy is a unique village builder where you establish your tribe, gather resources, and craft tools and buildings in a vibrant world. Explore and combat various challenges and other tribes in this vibrant, deck-builder roguelite while appeasing your god to earn his favour.
