name: Kairo: Lore of the Magic
summary: Guide Kairo throughout this exciting and challenging metroidvania adventure. Defeat enemies, solve mysteries, learn skills and restore peace back to the kingdom of Haamit.

name: Kai-Ri-Sei Million Arthur: Ring
summary: Million Arthur Ring is the latest sequel in the Million King Arthur series, bringing back the familiar four-Arthurs gameplay and four-player co-op mode. The game retains the classic card battle mechanics, including attribute weaknesses and card chain buffs, while introducing new strategic elements through CCG-style turn-based gameplay. Players can collect and customize various cards to build their ideal team.

name: Kapamilya Deal or No Deal
summary: Kapamilya Deal or No Deal is a fanmade Flash game based on the Philippines version of Deal or No Deal.

name: Kawaii Neko Girls 2
summary: Kawaii Neko Girls 2 - It's a relaxing anime puzzle game with cute kawaii hentai neko girls. Solve puzzles and collect all the pictures. Enjoy high quality artwork.

name: Kassei: Road Cycling
summary: Kassei: Road Cycling is a summer sports simulation game. To win the yellow jersey you have to manage your team optimally: as "directeur sportif" you decide on training plans as well as race tactics.

name: Kaleidoscope of Phantasm Prison 2
summary: A reunion of old middle school friends in a room resembling something from an Alice in Wonderland world. With chains and collars around the girls' necks.

name: Kamalatale
summary: Kamala is tasked with fighting for a New Way Forward that protects our fundamental freedoms and strengthens our democracy! Debate your way through a divided nation, secure endorsements and future voters, and finish what your mentor, Joe Biden, started!

name: Kamen Rider Decade
summary: Mod for the 2017 indie game Slay The Spire, based on the Kamen Rider series, and the "Kamen Rider Decade" installment

name: Kahoro and Tetra
summary:
A foreboding tower haunts the village. An evil witch resides there and she seems to have come out of nightmares in fairy tales. It is said she was searching for immortality, but she has not stepped out of the tower since eons ago. People have been disappearing and nobody knows exactly why. All they know is the witch did it.

Kahoro learns of this tale from their grandparents and believes the witch may have a cure for their peculiar illness. They run away from their home and enter the tower with the hope their nightmare will finally end.

But instead, a new dream begins. Kahoro meets Tetra, a doll and the ex-servant of the witch of the tower.

name: Kaiserredux
summary: KaiserreduX started out in late 2019 as a collection of various submods for Kaiserreich, later evolving into a unified submod turned fork and eventually - thanks to the continuous addition of new content, wider sweeping changes to lore and setting, and ever widening differences in design philosophies between the original base of the KR mod and KX - into a wholly separate entity that is in no way affiliated with KR beyond sharing the conceptual ideas for the timeline, albeit with many differences, and the base for the mod, so do not run the two mods together; KX is a standalone product. While KX has kept a considerable amount of pre-existing KR lore, much of which has changed by now, it has also introduced a lot of new elements and additions going beyond the scope of the timeline created back in the days of Kaiserreich for Darkest Hour.

name: Kairos'Light: Vanilla
summary: Yo! relive Kairos'Light Vanilla, our first project, only uglier and less fun! Chat with poorly-dialogued inhabitants, then return to the current version. New successes have been added, even if they're not guaranteed to work. Have a great adventure!

name: Kaamos
summary: Kaamos is a bite-sized turn-based puzzle roguelike where battles are fought by matching tiles on a grid with looping rows and columns. Build your character and deck of tiles by looting equipment from your foes. Traverse a dark medieval world where the Sun went down and never rose again.

name: Kathy Rain 2: Soothsayer
summary: In this point-and-click urban thriller, down-and-out private eye Kathy Rain will embark on her most dangerous case yet — the pursuit of the notorious serial killer known as the Soothsayer. Find clues, gather evidence, connect the dots, and confront the murderer before the hunter becomes the hunted…

name: Karoshi Club
summary: Explore the afterlife world of Yomi as a soul sales manager in the Japanese business punk first-person horror adventure "Karoshi Club".

name: Katanaut
summary: Descend into cosmic madness aboard a collapsing space station in Katanaut, a fast-paced action-roguelite. Unleash powerful abilities, master fluid combat, and confront eldritch horrors as reality unravels around you. Survive relentless battles and fight for your very existence.

name: Kanji de Go!
summary: Kanji de GO! is a free game developed by Micelle, on PC in 2023. Type the reading of the displayed kanji(Chinese character) within the time limit. There are several other modes of entering calculation results and English spelling.

name: Kaimyou Maker
summary: This is a tool that automatically generates, manages, and edits Kaimyou. It can also issue Kaimyou certificates and save them in an album, and it can be used as an Ihai.

name: Karaoke Party: Sing & Dance
summary: Immerse yourself in this fun children's karaoke where you can sing and watch animals dance to the rhythm of the music.

name: Kana Seito Defense
summary: Improve your Japanese learning with Kana Seito Defense, a typing defense game to learn the writing systems of Hiragana and Katakana, and to build proficiency in Kanji through extensive practice!

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.5 feat. V.W.P
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. V.I.P with V.W.P
Karting of Banban
summary: Grip your steering wheel and join your favorite Banban characters in the race of a lifetime! Drift around tight corners and zoom through locations both old and new. Use power-ups and boosts to dodge your opponents and claim first place!

name: Kaiju Control Force
summary: Lead a team of survivors into the abandoned Kaiju Control Force facilities, where bioengineered rats escaped and research went awry long ago, in this one-screen arcade platformer. Jump, climb and buy items from vending machines to reach the Mecha Kaiju Maintenance Bay and reclaim our city!

name: Karen Ready！
summary: You run your own perfume store as the owner of a perfume store. A sudden accident has involved you in the investigation of your own resurrection from the dead. The truth gradually emerges with three employees - a love affair about perfume. Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!

name: Kawaii Kitchen
summary: Kawaii Kitchen is a super cute cooking game for all the burger lovers out there! Starting as an amateur cook with a small kitchen, you’ll combine ingredients from all around the world to create over 100+ different burgers. You’ll also master color theory by cleverly mixing and serving color-based milkshakes that span the color spectrum!

name: Katana Dragon
summary:
Katana Dragon is an action-RPG adventure and dungeons exploration, where you play as the ninjas Shin and Nobi in their quest to end the curse that hangs over Sogen.
Learn ninja skills, upgrade your Dragon Gems, equip the Cursed Seals and level up. Avoid traps, solve puzzles and fight powerful enemies.
Your ninja way begins!

name: Kandinhale
summary: Kandinhale is a story-driven short RPG game in which you'll have to escape from the clutches of Kandinhale, the company that owns almost the entire consumable market in this idyllic candy world.

name: Kalak
summary: Discover “Kalak”, the ideal application for those who love challenges! Test your knowledge in geography, literature, history, science, general information and various other categories in a fun and entertaining way. Through the application, you can create your own game with family and friends and add them to your game for the challenge. Suitable for competition lovers and entertainment lovers. “Kalak” is your ideal application for an educational experience. Exciting, download now and start testing your knowledge!

name: Kazue World
summary: It's a shelljumps hack, with not too difficult tricks.

name: Kamikaze
summary: Kamikaze is a hack I have been making for a few years that I feel is ready to be finally played by others. I feel it's right at high Kaizo beginner to low intermediate for skill range.

name: Kamisama no Hitsugi
summary:
One day, a disaster occurs and the normal life of Chibana Michiru comes to an end.

He wakes up to a strange voice calling him, in front of him stands a classmate he has never spoken to before. He knows that they are inside the ”mysterious room”.

name: Kafka's Metamorphosis
summary: Kafka's Metamorphosis' is an emotional short-form story game based on the life of Czech writer Franz Kafka and his most famous novella, 'The Metamorphosis'. The game is set in the fall of 1912 when Kafka wrote The Metamorphosis. It captures Kafka's struggle to live as a writer while being pressured to fulfill roles as a young man, employee, and eldest son. The game aims to explore and express why Kafka wrote The Metamorphosis.

name: Kamitsubaki City Virtual Reality
summary: Dark-fantasy science fiction VR adventure game sharing the same basic story as Kamitsubaki City Regenerate.

name: Kaodi
summary: Kaodi is a brief, narrative-driven 2D platformer experience where you control Barren on his journey back home after playing a key role in the victory over the Republic of Shan. Explore a kingdom fractured by war and discover the scars it has left on its people.

name: Kaxuki: Hope for Peace
summary: KAXUKI is a modern PvP First Person Shooter Game where each player tries to reach the highest level on the leaderboard. Multiple weapons are available within the game and players can battle against their friends or others as opponents online. Host servers, or join your friends!

name: Kanji de Go! Shueisha Manga-sai
summary: The popular kanji quiz game "Kanji de GO!" teams up with Shueisha manga in a dream collaboration! Challenge yourself with furigana quizzes featuring tricky kanji from a wide range of Shueisha's classic and modern hit manga!

name: Kai's Bird Game, by Kai
summary: Kai's bird game, by Kai is an online game in which the player character, a white bird, has to avoid colliding with a black bird. Contrary to the name, it is not really known who actually made the game.

name: Kanken Smart Taisaku
summary: Switch iteration of the Kanken kanji study series of games, made for study for the Kanji Kentei test.

name: Kangaroo Court
summary: Kangaroo Court is a chaotic, satirical courtroom simulator for 4-40 players. Play as Judge, Defendant, Prosecutor, or Defense Lawyer, with roles like Jury, News Crew, Police, and more. Defend or incriminate the defendant, vote, and decide their fate based on their crimes!

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.10 feat. V.I.P
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.11 feat. V.W.P
summary:
Expansion Pack No.11
Includes the duet songs featuring five members of V.W.P!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!

[Included Songs]
"Magical" (RIM & KAF)
"Fearless" (RIM & Isekaijoucho)
"Irreversible" (Harusaruhi & KOKO)
"Gear" (KOKO & KAF)
"Prison"(Harusaruhi & Isekaijoucho)

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.12 feat. V.I.P
summary:
Expansion Pack No.12
Includes songs by the five members of V.I.P!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!

[Included Songs]
"Isseinode" (KAFU)
"Relay" (RIME)
"Anata no Uta"(HARU)
"Enshinryoku" (SEKAI)
"VIXEN" (COKO)

name: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.9 feat. V.W.P
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. ARU
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extra Pack feat. ASU
Kamitsubaki City Ensemble: Extension Pack No.13 feat. V.W.P
summary:
Expansion Pack No.13
Includes songs by the five members of V.W.P!
Hum along to some brand-new melodies!

[Included Songs]
"Gestalt" (KAF)
"Tick Tock Boy" (RIM)
"Wind walker" (Harusaruhi)
"Systems Core" (Isekaijoucho)
"Mirage code"(KOKO)

name: Kataude no Zarigani: One-armed Crayfish
summary: “Going against the grain is just another form of rebellion.” That's what high school student Yuta Nozaki believes, living by the principle of following the trend. Through his classmate Misaki Miyoshi, who constantly goes against the grain, Yuta begins to confront his true feelings.

name: Kakyuusei 2
summary:
Kakyūsei 2 is a dating sim and the sequel to 1996's Kakyūsei, itself a spin-off of the Dōkyūsei series.

The player is placed in the shoes of a student (default name: Oriya Rouma) during his last year of high school, as he is trying to find a girlfriend before graduation. Over the course of the story, he meets and bounds with nine eligible bachelorettes from his school, and can eventually chose to romance one of them.

Much like its predecessors, the gameplay centers around Oriya exploring his school, his local neighborhood, and the city, during which he can enter restaurants, shops, cafés, houses, etc. and potentially encounter the nine dateable girls and learn more about them through having conversations with them. The nature of these conversations usually depends on which location the girl is found at in and tends to feature multiple answers; in most cases these answers will either advance or hinder the progression of the relationship with the girl in question depending on the player's choices, leading to new story events. The game also features an internal clock and calendar, with some events, such as holiday celebrations or birthdays, only happening at certain times or on certain dates.

These two systems often times interact, with information given through conversations becoming relevant later down the line - most prominently, the girl in question can give a hint to their tastes in gifts, and if the player later gives them their desired item on their birthdays, it will greatly increase their approval of you.

Also like its predecessors, the game features scenes with nudity and explicit sexual situations.

[From MobyGames]

name: Karaoke Animal Party: Sing & Dance
summary: Sing, dance and have fun with 5 adorable animals in magical settings while enjoying the loudest karaoke for kids with 25 songs full of fun and joy!

name: Kanon no Kakin Nikki
summary: It is a multi-ending simulation game where you strive to become an alchemist. Along the way, discover new endings through encounters with different people.

name: Katekyou Hitman Reborn! DS: Vongola Shiki Taisen Battle Sugoroku
summary: A hilarious board game style filled with fun and spoilers from the anime.

name: Katsute Watashitachi ha Jigoku no Mattadanaka Deshita
Kabuto Park
summary: Enjoy summer in Kabuto Park! Capture the cutest bugs, train them and win the Summer Beetle Battles Championship in this little bug collection game! Upgrade your equipment to find rarer, stronger and shinier beetles, butterflies, bees or dragonflies.

name: Kapih
summary: Kapih is a classic run-'n'-gun shooter platformer, with action packed levels and boss battles. The visuals and music are inspired by the many lost in time art-styles of India. We follow the adventure of the protagonist Vaanar who is a common kid in a colorfully imagined ancient India.

name: Kaal Yoddha
summary: Kaal Yoddha is an action-adventure game steeped in the mythic heritage of ancient India. Step into the role of Prince Avyaan, a skilled warrior driven by curiosity and valor, as he answers a mysterious plea for help from a remote island besieged by a terrifying curse.

name: Kawairun
summary: Compete with your friends or play alone in this super fun\cute running game with cute clouds and yetis that hold limbo sticks.

name: Kasane Teto and Hatsune Miku are Lesbians
summary: A parody UTAU & Vocaloid visual novel where Kasane Teto asks out Hatsune Miku.

name: Kamikaze Tactics
summary: A turn-based tactical roguelike where you take charge of a crew of mercenaries in their quest for meaning & aerial supremacy. Collect your crew, upgrade your ships, and outmaneuver your foes to seize victory in this high-stakes tale of revenge!

name: Kaizen: A Factory Story
summary: Kaizen is an open-ended puzzle automation game from the original Zachtronics team, set in 1980s Japan. Design, build, and optimize production lines to create iconic products, like calculators, camcorders, and arcade machines.

name: Kara Fantasy
summary: Embark on an epic journey through five mystical forest worlds to save Princess Kara and show the world that the true hero lives in each of us.

name: Kakoi
summary:
A man wakes up in a strange room with no memories.

Who is he? Who is this nameless stranger who takes care of him? And why is he always locked in?

name: Kawaii Girls
summary: A charming world of classic jigsaw puzzles, where cuteness and coziness meet exciting gameplay.

name: Kalia
summary: Jump, climb, solve puzzles, and explore the ruins of Kalia. An engaging story awaits you, filled with mysteries and challenges. Discover the secrets of this lost world... if you dare!

name: Kaiju Evolution Survivor
summary: Kaiju Evolution is a top-down action roguelike game where you choose a Kaiju to evolve through four different size stages, from a microscopic creature into a gigantic world-ending threat. Survive for 20 minutes against increasingly larger waves of enemies as you learn new weapons and abilities.

name: Kaseki no Uta
summary:
Kaseki no Uta is an adult romance adventure game released by âge on January 28, 2000.
God created man. And man created "dolls". But what is the difference between these "dolls" and us humans?

This is a rare and monstrous work that mixes several motifs often used as popular elements in recent years, and then weaves them into a science fiction story!

However, what is this inexpressible sadness that lingers deeply in the heart at the end...

name: Katamari Damacy Rolling Live
summary: Katamari Damacy Rolling LIVE — the Katamari franchise’s first original game in nearly eight years — launches exclusively on Apple Arcade. In this new adventure, players roll the Katamari as ordered by the King of All Cosmos, embracing the series’ iconic gameplay of “roll, stick, and grow.”

name: Kappa no Kai-kata: How to Breed Kappas
summary: Konami's PlayStation 2 Kappa adventure game, based on the TV anime of the same name. The story takes places in Showa 40 and follows the story of a young boy named Hiroshi, who's forced to spend his summer at his grandparent's house. Hiroshi's grandparents have these green, prank-prone creatures called Kappas, and you earn your keep by raising them -- teaching them manners, guiding them and so-forth.

name: Kardmi
summary:
Kardmis are adorable creatures that inhabit the vast continent of Gerdon. Each Kardmi has unique and powerful abilities.
As trainers, your goal is to catch, train, and battle these kardmis, helping them grow stronger through evolution!

The name "Kardmi" blends "Card" and "Amigo" (Spanish for "friend"), symbolizing the strong bond between trainers and their Kardmis.

Your ultimate goal? Become a Kardmi Master!
Catch stronger Kardmis, challenge Gym Leaders, and rise to the top as the strongest trainer!!

name: Kadetstvo: Novaya Istoriya
summary: The game will have a new meeting with the heroes of the popular TV series: the charming bully Makarov, the handsome intellectual Sukhomlin, the kind Perepechko, ensign Kantemirov, General Matveyev and other old acquaintances.

name: Kanna School
summary: Welcome to Kanna Academy, a highly entertaining and innovative side-scrolling tower defense game!

name: Kamilia
summary:
Kamilia is an emotional, story-driven detective mystery where your choices shape the outcome.

Step into the shoes of a gifted painter, pulled into an unsolved mystery. An investigation that soon turns into something far deeper — an intimate, heartfelt search for truth.

Explore a beautifully crafted narrative blending mystery, emotion, and visual storytelling into a unique, choice-driven experience.

name: Kallio
summary: Help players trapped in a collapsed mine find their way out through different levels in a puzzle-style game. Play in single-player mode or with others online in multiplayer.

name: Kaila: The Journey to the Underworld
summary: 2D metroidvania with a medieval fantasy atmosphere. Play as Kaila, a young girl searching for her mother, taken by Graygar, the Grey Soul. Explore a vast world, uncover secrets, upgrade your skills, and face challenging bosses on your way to the Underworld. Are you ready to challenge Death itself?

name: Kaia's Ascent
summary: Run, climb, and charge punch your way out of the deep, dark abyss in this exhilarating first-person 3D parkour platformer.

name: Kappa Quest
summary: A fast-paced, retro-inspired adventure through ancient Japan!

name: Kabonk!
summary: Step into neon-lit arcades and break, blast, and push your way through bricks and obstacles in this nostalgic brick-breaking classic. Use physics, trick-shots, and power-ups in your advance to beat challenging levels and rack up high scores.

name: Kagerou Labyrinth
summary: An old explorer finds the ruins of an old civilization. in them, a few workers claim to have been trapped in "a different world with strange powers". the old explorer asks a scientist among his friends and his daughter to go investigate. they enter and are transported by a blinding light into a strange labyrinth.

name: Kare Kano Trial: Toki wo Kakeru Toki-meki Daisakusen
Kaitouranma Miyabi
summary: Kaitouranma Miyabi takes place in Japan during Edo period and takes course of a single year where the player is a student in a martial arts school. The game is a mix of visual novel style gameplay during dialogues and third-person perspective during training and fighting. During first-person perspective, the gameplay follows a typical static 2D anime character sprites over detailed graphical background art with smaller window showing current expression and disposition of a character talking. While the protagonist has no voice-acting, other character feature full voice-acting during dialogues. Training sequence consists of various actions that will boost player's skills and is displayed in isometric view from bird's perspective, while dueling is done from side view where player's skills and training it taken into consideration when performing various fencing moves. There are also several mini-games that become available as the story progresses.

name: Karumaruka Circle: Limited Edition
summary:
Box contents:
•Karumaruka Circle
•Acrylic Layer Frame

name: Katana Zero DLC
summary: This isn't a Chronos hallucination - the free Katana ZERO DLC is finally nearing completion. Get ready to continue Zero's journey right where it left off - and glimpse into his murky past. Featuring all new characters, levels, gameplay and story, this massive DLC promises to be worth the wait. Come play, my lord.

name: Kamitsubaki Academy Newspaper Club
summary: You wake up with amnesia in Kamitsubaki City, a city with a giant tower in its center. There, you meet a girl named Kafu Morisaki, and begin participating at the Kamitsubaki Academy Newspaper Club at her invitation.

name: Kami no Me no Aeon: Zenpen
Kami Kamera
summary:
On the last day of summer, the doors between the human and ghost worlds open, allowing 1000 ghosts to enter the mortal realm...

Some ghosts want to have fun, others wish to explore, and others are out for revenge...

Usually, demons known as SHASHINKAMI appear in the human world to send ghosts back by taking their pictures with a strange device known as the KAMI KAMERA.

This year, however, one SHASHINKAMI has decided that he wants to take a break from ghost hunting, and now one young girl must complete his task in his stead... OR DIE.

name: Kart Racing Star Simulator Game
summary: Race, drift, and speed past the competition. Master every track with skill and strategy. Become the ultimate kart racing champion.

name: Kard Combat
summary: A strategy card game with a single player campaign, puzzle challenges and multiplayer battles. Kard Combat was co-designed by Richard Garfield.

name: Karol World Breaker
summary: Karol World Breaker brings classic brick-breaking gameplay together with Survivors-like mechanics in a single game. Destroy wave of enemies with your balls. Collect coins to buy power-ups in the Store. Face wise enemies that will spawn debuffs that will make your adventure more difficult.

name: Kaz
summary:
KAZ, your shot of dopamine wrapped in a minimalist roguelike. Execute lightning-fast moves with frame-perfect controls : easy to learn, hard to master. Immediate, Intense, Addictive. Every run makes you better, faster, hungrier, unlocking tons of unique items, skins and challenges.
4 keys, no excuses: Prove your skill and dominate the ranks.

name: Kaiju No. 8: The Game
summary:
Crush colossal Kaiju with a game-changing blow! Experience exhilarating attacks with intuitive controls! Explore the world of Kaiju No. 8, recreated with stunning visuals!

Based on the global hit anime, adapted from the Shonen Jump+ sensation, KAIJU NO. 8 THE GAME brings you into the heart of the action! Witness epic battles between the Japan Anti-Kaiju Defense Force and cataclysmic Kaiju, all rendered in breathtaking graphics!

name: Kambayashi-ke Satsujin Jiken
summary: murder mystery genre.solve the game

name: Kaire
summary: A third-person game where you press switches, open doors, and interact with objects to clear a single stage. Developed in Unreal Engine 5, it features a coastal environment with cliffs and vertical terrain. As you walk on the sand or shoreline, waves react and footprints appear.

name: Kanken: Minna de Wai-wai Kanji Nou
Kappa-kun to Asobou: Kappa-kun to 3-biki no Koneko
Kappa-kun to Asobou: Kappa-kun to Mori no Nakama-tachi

Karaneko
summary: Karaneko is a bullet hell JRPG where players explore a pixel art fantasy world, examine objects, discover histories of three countries, and interact with NPCs. Choices impact the game, offering diverse genres like adventure, psychological, puzzle, visual novel, and horror.

name: Kakuchou Shoujo-kei Trinary
summary: Kakuchou Shoujo-kei Trinary is a mobile RPG developed by Gust and Toei Animation. Released in 2017, it blends real-time battles with an interactive narrative that unfolds through live-updated anime episodes and character communication features. Players assist five girls fighting digital threats known as "Phenomenon" while forming bonds through daily conversations and decisions. The game was part of a multimedia project and ran until August 31, 2018.

name: Kart Bros
summary: Kart Bros is a free kart racing game that's packed with wild antics! Whether you're hugging the turns, drifting around tracks or hurling powerups with friends, Kart Bros is an io racing game that delivers non‑stop thrills in every race.

name: Kalit
summary: A unique survival adventure, animated in a 1930s rubber hose style! Fight to survive: capture creatures, farm, mine, and craft everything you need—from gear and vehicles to your base. Explore lands and underwater depths with their shipwrecks, amidst dangers and wonders.

name: Kamata
summary: Join Nia in a cozy adventure to save the future of her island! Clean up the tropical paradise of Zimzemba by recycling, composting, and uncovering hidden secrets. Upgrade your gear, make friends, and solve the mystery behind the island's pollution.

name: Karim and the 60 Thieves
summary: Your Granny's retirement fund has been stolen! Do you have what it takes to get it back? Fight through waves of enemies and three unique stages to bring the notorious Hackerguy to justice and get Granny's money back!

name: Karls Kavern
summary: Karls Kavern is a platformer in the style of Manic Miner. It consists of thirty single screen levels where the objective in each is to simply collect all the boxes that lies scattered around. To make it the player has to jump between platforms (including moving ones) and avoid getting touched by any of the dangers that exist in the underground. Any contact will lead to a loss of life and so will a long fall. Part of the levels are also collapsing platforms and conveyor belts. The player has five lives and when they are all used up the game ends.

name: Kaido Genkai
summary: Kaido Genkai is an open-world racing exploration game that blends the excitement of high-speed races with the charm of anime-style graphics and RPG elements, set in a nostalgic 90's fictional Japanese countryside. Come explore the open world and see who you meet along the way!

name: Kathana
summary:
Embark on an epic journey in Kathana and immerse yourself in a world brimming with adventure!

Join forces with friends and connect with adventurers from around the globe in this captivating classic MMO. Set out on shared quests, overcome formidable challenges, and experience everything Kathana has to offer.

name: Kasama: The Awakening
summary: Dive into this magical journey and join Orion The Orange in the adventure of a lifetime through dreams and nightmares. Uncover the secrets, face your fears, and restore the balance in the land of Kasamas! Will you dare to dream and face the night with them?

name: Kalma
summary:
You're a mythical Finnish warrior, descending to the depths of the crypts to show Kalman Väki who's the boss. Swing that axe at the ghosts of Kalma.

You advance to next level when you have cleaned the dungeon from all enemies.

5 levels of dungeon crawling sweetness!

name: Katharsi
summary: Katharsi is a puzzle adventure set in a corrupted Byzantine cathedral. With the help of your companion, cleanse and illuminate the path in front of you by harnessing the power of the light. Solve the puzzles that block your path and reveal the truth behind this story.

name: Kakurenbo: Hide and Seek
summary: "KAKURENBO: Hide and Seek" is a 3D horror adventure with hand-drawn 2.5D art. Play as a young student exploring an abandoned building. Limited first-person view and eerie sounds build tension. With four endings, it's a short, immersive experience lasting around one hour.

name: Karma: The Dark World - Limited Edition
summary:
KARMA: The Dark World Physical Limited Edition include:
- An Exclusive Slipcover case
️- Three Art Cards,
- Leviathan ID Badge
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Art Book!

name: Kaskade
summary: Connect an evolving delivery network in Kaskade, a minimalist strategy game. Construct intricate paths to ensure each delivery gets to the right destination. Unlock upgrades to manage the increasing complexity as your network grows. Relax to the ambient soundtrack and the satisfying puzzle vibes.

name: Kabuki Fire
summary: Every year, the world's best shooters gather on an tropical island, to participate in a lethal competition!

name: KaruQ
summary:
Numbered ghosts appear on the screen.
You can defeat them by hitting them with flames of the same number.

Flames can be merged (multiply) or split (divide).
You can also add 1 to a flame using a match.
Use these tricks to create different number flames and take down the ghosts.

name: Kayaks Don't Climb
summary: Kayaks aren’t made to climb but you’re doing it anyway!

name: Kando Realm
summary: Journey into the world of Kando. Take on creatures, craft awesome weapons, help villagers and cut down tree's. Will you slay your way to the top? Or become a master craftsman. It's all down to you.

name: Karakage The Sky Shadow
summary: A stylish 5v5 anime-inspired multiplayer shooter set in immersive, realistic environments. Master unique abilities, outsmart your enemies, and fight for dominance in a world where style meets strategy

name: Kassei: Road Cycling 2025
summary: Kassei 25 is a summer sports simulation game. Become a road cycling manager and master every aspect of the discipline - from training plans to team selection to race tactics! Are you ready for a new season?

name: Kawaii Girls Panic
summary: Classic arcade gameplay remastered! Conquer the bigger portion of the screen and save the panic girls from the various absurd troublemakers.

name: Kaguya
summary: High-School Heroines Take to the Skies!A fully-voiced bullet hell shoot-'em-up that's friendly to newcomers!Wipe out the AI robot army and save the day!

name: Kamikomori
summary: KAMIKOMORI is a 3D horror adventure set in a Japanese shrine. In this mysterious sanctuary where ascending leads to the future and descending leads to the past, the girl delves deeper into the mystery of the disappeared.

name: Katana
summary: Katana is a clicker game where you click... a katana! Click the katana to earn more katanas — simple, addictive, and ever-growing. Every 3 hours, you'll receive a random katana drop to add to your collection.

name: Kai UnEarthed
summary: Explore an afrofuturistic 3D world scavenging and journaling your way to becoming a wildtender: someone who heals the relationship between humans and more-than-human beings. Reflect on the choices you make, the artifacts you leave behind, and the worlds that will grow out of them.

name: Kami Quest: Enter the Imagynasium
summary: Kami Quest is a whimsical 3D platformer where you play as Sabbath, an energetic dalmatian exploring the ever-shifting Imagynasium, a living castle full of quirky spirits, surreal worlds, and hidden secrets.

name: Kaidan
summary: Brutal and unforgiving, Kaidan plunges you into a nightmarish vision of Japanese dark fantasy twisted by cosmic horror. Alone or with friends, strategise carefully as you endure a relentless descent into madness, where every moment is a vicious fight to survive.

name: Kawaii Girls: Venice Crush
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Kawaii Girls: Cute Cheerleader
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Kayaking
summary: At first, even paddling might feel difficult. That's okay. everyone starts out that way. Ride a kayak with your guide cat and travel across the world, collecting hidden items along the way. By the end of your journey, you'll have become the true King of Kayaking.

name: Kawaii Girls: Rural Romance
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Kaelaverse: Pemascape
summary: Kaela Kovalskia of Hololive ID has gone missing! Play as her army of assistants, the Pemaloe, and set off to explore caves, dungeons, and mazes and discover the truth about Kaela's whereabouts!

name: Karaoke Squad
summary: A tower defense that makes you dance! The blues are ruining the party. Place mics by tapping on the rhythm and defend the stage against the ghosts to keep the party going.

name: Kana No Mado
summary: Learn to read Japanese hiragana and katakana with this calm and focused educational app. Practice kana recognition through sound and visual quizzes. No writing or grammar - just reading practice at your own pace. Ideal for beginners in Japanese.

name: Karma Keepers
summary: Karma Keepers is an idle/incremental souls sim where you guide souls, collect spiritual energy, upgrade and automate to keep corruption at bay, and push karma to the max to banish demons.

name: KanjiFlash
summary: KanjiFlash is a focused flashcard/mini-game/quiz trainer that teaches Kyōiku kanji, hiragana, and katakana, giving you the foundation for Japanese literacy and early JLPT success.

name: Karma Jump
summary: After taking his own life, Bobi awakens in a shadow realm ruled by the Angel of Darkness. To escape eternal torment, he must complete twisted trials tied to his past sins. Fight for redemption in this dark narrative adventure.

name: Kabenaguri
summary: This is a game of punching walls.

name: Kanji in Motion
summary: Kanji in Motion is a program for learning to read, in a game-like way, the characters of the two sets of kana, plus the 2,136 Jōyō Kanji. The task of the player-learner is to quickly identify characters that move across a playing field and match them to their respective reading and meaning.

name: Karaoke Love Song
summary: Share your best beautiful voice with a karaoke game themed around love songs.

name: Kaiju Cleaner Simulator
summary: Clean up the aftermath of epic Kaiju battles in this brutal first-person simulator for 1-4 players. Carve up giant monster corpses, extract rare organs, operate heavy machinery, and wash away the blood and toxins polluting the city streets!

name: Kaiju Cracking Corporation
summary: "KaijuCrackingCorp" is a simulation game about dismantling Kaiju. Manage your company, hire and train employees, and make decisions to maximize profits. Enjoy strategic gameplay mixed with fun mini-games for a unique and casual experience.

name: Kalaha
summary: A classic two-player strategy board game where players collect pearls and outmaneuver their opponent through careful planning and tactical moves. Easy to learn, challenging to master.

name: Kaiju Cleanup
summary: Relax and unwind by cleaning up the world’s biggest corpses. In a Cleaning Sim like no other, your job is to slice up and tidy away Kaiju carcasses, leaving the city clean and serene. Until the next Kaiju attack, obviously.

summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

summary: Kapputte kranz chap1 ,descibe a story of interdependence after the "great silence" World War , the hero wakes up for some reason, and meets the mysterious girl who is still sleeping. The prologue of a story of attachment to the world in the future.

name: Karmx
summary:
KARMx is a real-time level editor that lets you build maps in a Lovecraftian medieval fantasy boomer shooter.

You can share your map through the Steam Workshop.

name: Kaminari
summary: Explore a fantasy feudal Japan, teeming with authentic Yokai creatures. Build your own character, choosing a race, class, and combat abilities. Learn the way of the sword, master the elements through magical talismans, or become a master marksman in Kaminari.

name: Kats Trigger
summary: "Kats Trigger" is a story-driven action game that tells the tale of an otter who lost his family and a stray cat who lost her home.

name: Katagiri-san is Very Cold
summary: You wake up in a dimly lit room, with your classmate Katagiri-san in front of you. Why are you here? Who could've done it? Why is she here? Maybe there is a way to get out of this place... Try to find your way out in this short escape room RPG with hints of horror, comedy, and a bit of spice!

name: Katagiri-san is Relying on Me
summary:
You wake up in a dimly lit room, with your classmate Katagiri-san in front of you. Why are you here? Who could've done it? Why is she here...? Wait a minute... I think you've been here once before. Everything looks the same, yet something seems off...

Try to find out what brought you back to this place in this short escape room RPG with hints of horror, comedy, and a bunch of sweets lying around!

name: Kawaii Clicker Reborn
summary: Ultimate cute clicker is back and even cuter than ever! Fill up the gauge to enter “Fever Mode” and get lots of hearts! Let's click to see cute animations of cute characters!

name: Kamikaze Strike: FPV Drone
summary: Fly a kamikaze drone through fast-paced FPV missions. Dodge bullets, sneak past jammers and radars, and crash into tanks, troops, and enemy bases. Discover diffferent drones and face tougher challenges in every level.

name: Kali's Legion
summary: An open-world adventure RPG. Trade, hunt, fight, plunder, ravage settlements and cities, descend into the dungeons of long-destroyed civilizations, level up your character, assemble a squad, join factions, don't let the disaster happen again, stop the legion!

Kawaii Girls: Spicy Scientist

name: Kaos Kards
summary: Do you like strategy? Do you enjoy throwing bread at people? Well then this game is for you! Take on five unique opponents in a fast-paced strategy card game where every turn is a mind game. Build your deck, manage your hand, and time your plays to gain the upper hand. Use Action Cards to attack, heal, or defend. Boost your odds with Dice Cards, or shake things up with unpredictable Kaos Cards that affect everyone on the field.

name: Katana Hime
summary: A short game about simple command-based Katana Slashes... and saving a cat.

name: Kanji Drop
summary: Blocks with Japanese Kanji on them fall and you try to eliminate them by forming words and and activating kanji-related powerups by combining them into more complex Kanji.

name: Karate Rogue
summary: A fusion of martial arts and roguelike dungeon crawling—build your fighter, master lethal techniques, and conquer the abyss with your fists alone. Strike. Survive. Evolve.

name: Kakure-oni
summary: This is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game. Deep within pitch-black ruins, with only the beam of a flashlight to guide you, the children must play KAKUREONI -a deadly game of hide-and-seek- to bring an end to the ritual of reincarnation.

name: Katze Stuck in the Toilet 64 PC
Kawaii Girls: Busty Bear
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Kaon : Fragmented Core
summary:
KAON: Fragmented Core is a 2D action-platformer inspired by retro classics, blending fast-paced movement, precise combat, and powerful transformations.
Players control Kaon, a mechanical hero exploring fragmented technological zones filled with enemies, challenges, and hidden secrets.
The game features an evolving energy-shot system, transformation abilities that change gameplay possibilities, and progression focused on exploration and skill mastery.

KAON highlights hand-drawn visuals, dynamic encounters, and gameplay built around speed, rhythm, and responsiveness.

name: Kalico @ Uni
summary: Kalico @ Uni is a cosy, 2D pixel art game about a small cat starting University in a big new city. Explore your new flat, meet quirky animal classmates, make friends and brave the communal kitchen. A gentle, story-driven experience about moving away from home and starting a new chapter of life.

name: Kaidogaku
summary: Kaidogaku is a symbolic deduction puzzle game. Decipher the positions for all symbols by make use of a list of placement rules. No progression no grinding just straight and simple fun to immerse in thought and lose the sense of time passing.

name: Kaidou ni Kisu
summary:
A story constantly demands to choose between two choices.

Four men and women who had known each other via the internet had met and gone through several offline meetings. At the inn they are staying, they meet a mysterious girl, Hiro.

As they gradually deepen their relationship with her, the protagonist fell in love with such a girl.

During the limited days of the offline meeting,
A pleasant and elated time slowly passes.

...Nevertheless, no matter how leisurely it is,
The day of parting will definitely come.

"...I won't let that happen."

There is only one choice entrusted to you.

A story with only one turning point.

Is it white...? Or is it black...?

As those colors are placed upon, you will see what lies within those "gray eyes'' for the first time.

name: Kart Racing
summary: Kart Racing is an in-flight kart racer that is playable as a part of Singapore Airlines' KrisWorld Digital service.

name: Kaya The Dog
summary: You experience the life of an abused dog, forced to stay in one place and only watch as the world moves on around him. This game tries to show you how lonely our pets can be and how Important it is to treat them right.

name: Karous
summary: Karous was the final commercial release for the Sega Dreamcast, in 2007. It has received an updated port with new assets for modern consoles.

name: Kasha vs. Kritters
summary: A retro-style arcade action game where you're a lone catgirl defending her house from a relentless onslaught of pests!

name: Kart Duel
summary:
To increase the competition levels in 2 player mode, Namco has introduced the new "continue system" where the losing driver has to pay for the next continuing play. In addition, 1 free game is given per 4 continuous rounds of 2 player play.

The competition is also increased with players competing each lap time. When a player marks his or her best lap, their position in the top 100 rankings will be displayed on screen during the race.

When a player finishes the race within the regulation position, they can go on to the next circuit. When all the circuits are cleared, the player can challenge the best racer from Namco's R&D staff.

There are a choice of 4 circuits (3 of the circuits are based on actual tracks) to suit the individual's skill level and players can select their kart to suit each circuit, strategy and driving style. The DX cabinet has a motion base which moves from side to side responding quickly to handling and road service conditions.

name: Kaiju Inc.
summary: Kaiju Inc. is a Real-Time Tactics + Roguelike Monster Raising game! Mutate, Modify, and Evolve your monsters! Build your strongest monster squad through Roguelike stages!

name: Kawaii Girls: Vegas Romance
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Kamen Rider Black RX: Isoge! Crisis Teikoku
Kamen Rider Black: Hissatsu Rider Kick
KARANTIIN
summary:
Karantiin is an atmospheric open-world survival horror first-person shooter built in Unity. Players explore a hostile environment where they must scavenge for resources, manage vital statistics such as food, thirst, health, bleeding, radiation, and infection, and use any tools or weapons found to survive against threats.
The game combines physics-driven combat with inventory management and exploration. It features an open world with story levels, two additional game modes, and environmental mechanics that require strategic decisions to stay alive. Monsters and human enemies react to sound, and players must balance exploration with risk.
Development emphasizes performance and immersion, with configurable graphics settings, real-time lighting, and optimization for modern PCs. The project is solo-developed and continues to receive updates focused on expanding world content and gameplay systems.

name: Kana.exe
summary: Kana.exe is a Y2K inspired mystery horror game. The gameplay was largely inspired by games such as Yume Nikki, Doki Doki literature club and pony island.

name: Kadath
summary: A Lovecraftian adventure inspired by the book "The Dream-Quest of Unknown Kadath". A text-only game with choose-your-own-adventure gameplay style. Made in 1979 by Gary Musgrave for the Altair 8800 and the Exidy Sorcery. In 1983 the Commodore PET got a "remake" of the game by the name "Eye of Kadath"

name: Kawaii Girls: Dashing Devil
summary: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Kantmis-Zero
summary: "Kantmis-Zero" is a boss rush action game. As the only chosen one on the Kantmis continent, you must follow the divine instructions and complete the trials.

name: Kana Mind
summary:
Kana Mind is a free, ad-less app to help you easily memorize the Japanese Kana.

It works an educational game that helps you learn to recognize the symbols used in Katakana and Hiragana (collectively called "Kana"), the first two alphabet styles used in the Japanese language. With this knowledge, you'll be able to read aloud and write words in Japanese.

name: Kazuma Kaneko's Tsukuyomi
summary: Ancient myths awaken in a modern-day Babel. A tactical deck-building tower dungeon RPG from the legendary Demon Artist, Kazuma Kaneko.
